text: Really nice staff. They really were busy. They also did not have a truck we needed to move with so we had to use a van. I am not sure if we were charged the same or less or even more than what we wanted to use.

name: Douglas Mckee
text: This place is a rip off, don't do business with them , find another store. Called and needed the truck a couple more hours they charged me for a whole day, but wanted it back 7:00 am when 5:30 pm would have been the whole day from the time I rented it. The put more fuel in it than it had when I got it. It's all over when they get your card number. They are just dishonest!!

name: CHUD 312
text: Use to be good

name: Robin Welsh
text: I needed my old wiring removed and new wiring put on, Willow knew exactly what to do and was fast. She is awesome.  I highly recommend her and this store.

name: Bob Pietrs
text: Very good.  Very nice truck.  Great people.  ONE CAUTION:  If you rent a truck, rent it for the WHOLE day.  If you rent it for a short period and find out later that your move is taking too long, u haul can charge you a $50 inconvenience fee (inconvenient to the next scheduled renter) plus an additional rental period fee (like $29).  The reason for this, is that the local u-hauls try to schedule the truck for several customers in one day, so if you go beyond your stated rental period, you face the extra fees!  U-HAUL DOES NOT TELL YOU THIS UP FRONT.

name: Faith
text: Very friendly and helpful staff. We check in online so there was very little wait before we were on our way.

name: John Smith
text: I had to fill two 100lb and one 20lb propane tanks today. My only vehicle is a car. I loaded up the tanks into my hatch lying down. When I arrive at the facility, they inform me that they cannot fill my tanks if they enter the property lying down. I had no one available with a truck to meet me across the street. You also cannot park across the street and carry them upright onto the property. I had to drive my car across the road, rent a uhaul truck, drive across the road in the truck, load them upright in the bed of the truck, and then I had to bring them onto the property to fill them before doing everything in reverse order. Also, if you have any adapters on the 100lb tanks which make it slower to fill, they won't allow you to borrow any tools to remove the adapter (adjustable/ crescent wrench). Which means, I only got one of my 100lb tanks filled, because they didn't want to hassle with the adapter on the second one. While I did get two of my three tanks filled, it took entirely too much time and effort to simply fill a few propane tanks.

name: Jennifer Hallinan
text: Ordered a trailer hitch to hang a bike rack off of my car from this Uhaul location. 6 days later it was in and i dropped my car off to have it installed. 5 hours later they called to say they couldn't put it on because they didn't have all the parts. Really???? i order them. you said they were in. And for this I had to leave my car for 5 hours to then not get my hitch put on and told i would have to wait again.  Manager there was extremely rude to me and told me there was nothing he could do for me and proceeded to not only smirk at me but to laugh at me in front of other employees and customers. A paying customer should NEVER be treated this way. we ARE the reason you are in business. DO NOT go here, they are clueless!!!!!

name: saLina Kee
text:
Corey kagel was so helpful.. he went above and beyond with customer service. While in the facility, Tyne other workers continually ask him questions and to do things for them.  He never  lost his good attitude it got flustered
And when my truck adoring was messed up, he actually went anf got s tool box and fixed it for me.  Great example of customer service and has my loyalty.  I will use the facility again for my uhaul needs because of such outstanding service!

name: Matthew Self
text: I just wanted to contact you to let you know of my experience with two different U-Haul locations in Huntsville, AL on Dec. 31, 2015.  It was such a bad experience that I will never use U-Haul again.  On Dec. 30, 2015 I reserved a pickup truck for rental the following day at the location at 3713 Governor's Drive in Huntsville.  I was scheduled to pick this vehicle up at 11:30am.  I showed up a few minutes early and the location was empty.  A few minutes later, Tammy, the General Manager comes in from the back and informs me that my reservation has been moved to the location across town at 4400 University Drive in Huntsville.  I needed to have the truck in a certain location to pick up some furniture by noon of that day and this was already placing me behind schedule considering that I was never notified in advance of this change.  A few minutes later I arrive at the location on University Drive to attempt my pick up.  While waiting in a line of 5 people, I start to become stressed because it is already 11:45am.  The General Manager at this location, Paulette Boehlke, informs me that it doesn't matter when I was scheduled to pick up this truck.  She states, that I will have to wait in line while she continues taking peoples orders and then going outside to fit them for their truck.  I am a bit in a panic because this is not what I expected considering that I had reserved the truck for a specific pick up time for a reason.  I finally left the location because I could not see it fit to pay U-Haul for the poor job they had done with having my reservation ready for pick up that morning.  All this especially considering they have a sign in office guaranteeing that they will have the truck you order at the right location at the right time available for you.  I cancelled my order with U-Haul and was able to reserve a truck with another moving company.  Tammy, from the first location called while I was on the way to pick up the new truck and tried to get me to come by and pick up a truck that was now there at her location on Governor's Drive.  She claimed that the reason I couldn't pick up the truck at the scheduled time and scheduled location was because the call center had double booked that time.  The pick up that was sitting outside her location when I was their earlier, she said, had been left by someone that had not left their keys with her.  Either way, the whole thing was crap.  I intend to never use U-Haul's services again and will inform people of this issue in the Huntsville locations.

name: madison young
text: About the slowest possible service.  employees are friendly and nice enough,  but apparently there aren't enough of them. standing in a line of 7 to 8 people for over 20 minutes while one or two guys run back and forth to trucks is pretty ridiculous.

name: Philip Eason
text: I rented a trailer from this place. I didn't check the tire pressure until after I had loaded the trailer and done some highway driving. It was about 50 PSI with the tire still hot when it was supposed to be 70 PSI cold. It was stupid to trust these people and I'm glad I didn't have a blowout. Won't be back.

They accepted my reservation and changed the reservation without even notifying me so I showed up at the wrong location. Second they didn't have the reservation for the time I reserved it for and so I took off from work for nothing because I could not get the U-Haul until the next day. I am currently disputing the bill and complaining about the terrible indifferent attitudes displayed by the staff and I'm getting the run around from the manager. If you are decent and organized with no time to waste...DONT USE THIS LOCATION

name: Adam Bertagnolli
text:
(Updated after finding issues) Every time I step in this place, they are packed like the DMV and never have enough employees to handle it for 1 reason or another.  Today, I took my vehicle in for a tow hitch at 8am.  It was only supposed to take a few hours.  It ended up taking them until 2pm to finish it, because they kept taking the installer off the job to handle the crowd.  You should have a separation of concerns when running a business.  That installer should've been able to focus on his work instead of having constant distractions.  In that time, he managed to somehow run my battery dead.  After I finally hooked a 5x8 trailer up, I found out that the hitch was slanted towards the ground, making it impossible to use a trailer.  I ended up having to have the movers who were moving most of my stuff take everything, but the stuff they couldn't take (i.e. aerosols, propane, gas cans, etc) which caused my move to take longer and cost more.  My muffler also was rattling against the hitch which was very annoying.  I finally got to my destination and had the hitch uninstalled, and and a full refund was made.  However, the installer at my new destination found damages made to my vehicle from the initial install.  So, now I"m going to have to take it to my dealership for repairs, which will be getting paid for by UHaul's claim agency.  If only all the time that I put into this whole ordeal could be compensated too!

My 2nd issue was that my calls to check the status were being routed to their corporate office who kept claiming they were unable to give any status on my install, and they discouraged me from directing my call to the location, claiming they probably wouldn't answer.  Corporate customer service sucks basically.  What they should've done was figure out what was going on with it instead of just leaving me out in the dark, which basically forced me to drive back down there and wait on it.

Also, don't buy boxes from these people.  In order to get the "discounted" rate, you have to buy them by the bundle.  I put quotes on "discounted", because Home Depot sells them individually for the same price...actually, cheaper.  Plus you can get an additional 5% discount if you have a Home Depot credit card.

resp.text:
Sir, we are sorry that you feel we run a bad business. The ad said first come, first serve. So yes, we did say that the first one to come in with the deposit, got it. Our business hours are posted on Facebook and Google. The only days we are not in the office is on Saturday afternoon/evening to Sunday. We do try to spend those days with family and "leave work, at work". We are sorry this has upset you enough to leave a bad review, but we are more than happy to keep an eye out for another repo for you in the future.  Please understand that if we held everything for someone that simply asked how to pay a deposit, we wouldn't sell much, because people do not always show up when they say they will. Again, if you would like us to be on the look out for another repo, please let us know.

Have a great day!

name: Poseidon Master
text:
I have visited U-hauls throughout the Shoals area and in many different states and I can now conclusively say that Karah at this location is bar none the best manager at any U-haul location that I have visited in over 15 years of having rented from U-haul.  She consistently goes out of her way to ensure that the customer has a pleasant experience and a smooth transaction with no task being considered too lowly for a manager to perform doing everything from skillfully handling U-hauls computer systems in record time, to even offering to help me to hook up a trailer in the rain!  If U-haul does not promote her to the corporate team soon, it will be a huge mistake on their part.

I also have to mention Britney at this location who I have known for just a little less time than Kara.  Britney goes above and beyond in every transaction to see to it that my rental is in tip top shape and consistently has been first on the scene to help me to unhitch my trailer as soon as I arrive.  Brittney has the skills the knowledge, the personality to keep this location running like a greased wheel as a manager when Kara is promoted to corporate so U-haul what are you waiting for.

I will have to recruit both of these amazing workers myself if your team doesn't choose quickly to make use of their amazing potential. I would consider the customer service at this U-haul location with these two team members to be the absolute best in the entire Shoals area. They are both a shining example of the customer service that this town is so desperately lacking.  It is rare to stumble across one worker like Brittney who enjoys what she does and does it well, it is even more rare to find a manager like Kara who does the same all while maintaining a productive and pleasant workplace for her team!

When you visit this place, tell them Lee sent you!

resp.text: Dear Most Valued Customer, Karah and Brittany  of Midgard Self Storage located at 1015 Glendale Street in Florence Alabama truly thank you for taking your valuable move time to not only award the highest 5 star experience rating for "over the to", consistent customer service in meeting your UHUAL needs in a rapid, accurate manner, but for your kind comments regarding honest, helpful customer care in a productive, pleasant environment assisting you in unhitching your trailer as soon as you arrive at the facility. text: Road Runner Moving either lost or stole four Samsung TVs, high end bed frame, surround sound equipment, chair, lamp.  These are the facts of my experience with them.  I incurred a loss of valuables worth of $10,000.  This does not include the multiple items that were broken or destroyed during the storage and move.  This was the worst consumer experience of my life.  I’m still in shock.  Decide for yourself if you should use them for your move.

text: Roadrunner out of Birmingham is a horrible, dishonest company. The damaged some of our furniture and lost many, many items and accused us of lying. The owner is the most dishonest person I have ever dealt with.

text: Road Runner Moving Company did all of those things and more. First they showed us all of our items on paper so we can begin to make changes and adjust our list. Since we were flexible they told us the best date and time to do our relocation to save even more money. Then finally the movers were respectful and very hard working. They were also careful with all of our pieces. This could not have been completed without your help.

name: Marsha Hendricks
text: We spent 2609.00 for the moving,  our furniture was damaged do to them not paying attention to what they were doing.

name: Jeromy Sullivan
text: These guys were hard working, extremely friendly, and very polite. They were no-nonsense and were always communicated to each other - they had an efficient system in place and all we could do was ask what we can do to help. Kudos to Michael and crew, you guys were top notch. Thank you for your excellent service.

name: Amanda Graham
text:
I used Road Runner moving as they were the only company that I found that would move my upright piano without charging an arm and a leg. The only real downside to using this company was their call center - it took me forever to finally get scheduled and confirmed, since if the phone rings for too long, the call gets forwarded to a call center in another state. That does me no good.
However, once confirmed, the movers were professional and on time, and their estimate for my move was spot on. They were also very fast and efficient. The only down side to the actual move was that they did not wrap the furniture before items were placed on the dolly. The items might have been wrapped once inside the truck, but that just made me nervous.
Overall, a very positive experience.

name: Thomas Carlisle
text: Had a good residential moving experience with Road Runner Moving. The price was reasonable and the men onsite were very professional and took great care of our furniture and items. Highly recommend them if you are moving a short or long distance like us.

name: Pete Lauterbach
text:
DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! Tell your family and friends as well. Here is my experience moving from Bham to ATL (you cannot make this stuff up). I have moved over 20 times and they are the worst movers I've ever used.
1) They brought the wrong sized truck so many items were left and had to be brought later. Some of which never came at all.
2) They significantly damaged a number of items including my grand piano. I spent $500 to fix the piano and they refused to reimburse me.
3) They lost items. They actually left them on the truck. After 3 emails and 3 phone calls and 2 weeks later they "found" them under some blankets on the truck. This was only after I demanded reimbursement for the missing items.
4) Worst of all, during the move the "lead guy" made inappropriate comments to my 15 year old daughter on 3 different occasions to the point where she felt uncomfortable and went out of her way to avoid him. The lead guy did this.
I have now gotten an attorney involved. They are a terrible. Use anyone but them. Feel free to private message me if you want any more details.

name: Daniel Webster
text: I moved in to my unit today. After setting up with another place and moving 2500 miles to here I was told the unit was no longer available from a different place. With a quick google search I found trimax. Made a phone call and an hour later I was set. The two ladies in the office were very pleasant to work with and gave a sense of security for me. I know my stuff is protected here. The price is extremely fair for the size of units and the fact that they have lights and power. The driveways are plenty large enough to bring big vehicles in which was another issue I was having at other locations. I was able to bring my 40 foot race trailer in with ease and unload it. Traffic was low in and out of the facility. The grounds are kept very clean and you can tell that every one working there takes pride in what they serve the public. Thanks you Trimax!!

name: Candace Orona
text:
The manager is polite, courteous, friendly and helpful.
During the rental process we asked about insurance.  The business does not offer insurance.  I am assuming that you would have to find your own through an independent agent or go through your homeowners.
That said, our unit was broken into before we had been there 3 months.
Yes, it is inexpensive to rent a unit here....  But the cost will be much higher when you find your unit has been trashed, your belongings rifled through, boxes and containers torn or cut open, items stolen or broken and thrown about.  Its not worth the heartbreak... some things cannot be replaced.
You may want to consider another storage place with better security.... and insurance.

text: Reserving the unit was easy enough, but come move-in day when our truck was loaded and we had hands to help us, our key code was denied and no one would answer our calls. The unit is clean and new and they may have better days, but being denied access on move-in day was beyond frustrating

When i approached Rick to say i was bailing, i forgot to say my building letter but he already knew what it was. This suggests to me that a close eye is being kept on the place, which is exactly what you want in a storage facility.

name: Sarah Adkins-Jablonsky
text:
This is the first one star review I’ve ever given.

Uhaul cancelled without our notice and did not care, leaving us in the cold

We rented a 15 ft truck weeks before a cross city move from this Vestavia location. The day before, we got a call saying the pick up location was at True Value in Helena AL. When we get there, the True Value reps said it was not available due to a mishap with another customer and to call to find a location where we could pick up our truck. When we called the Vestavia store to find out truck, they said our reservation had been cancelled. When? By whom? They could not tell us (????) but said there was a cancellation email (but we never received an email— our emails only tell us to go to TrueValue). So we are left without a truck and without an apology.

When we try to make a new reservation, the closest option was a 30ft truck a 3 hour round trip away.

U-Haul permanently lost a customer.

name: Krista Bell
text: The employee we saw at pickup was very nice. Per our contract, we rented the uhaul from 5:30pm to 8:30pm, but this kind employee told us we could turn it in before opening the next day (7am). We returned at 6:45am, and Sabrina was very rude and charged us for 2 days. (We only had the uhaul for 12 hours.) When I explained the situation, she just kept stating to “read the contract”. I’m aware of what the contract said as I made the reservation, but when an employee tells me differently, I take their word. Very disappointed.

name: Louis Gobeo
text: Outstanding service. The day I visited, the manager was working through an issue with their alarm. Despite what was surely a stressful situation, she provided prompt and courteous service and bent over backwards to help us out with our rental. I cannot recommend this place enough. Thank you!

name: Vince Marshall
text: wonderful staff great, clean and cool storage facilities

name: Corey
text: Friendly service and was everything i needed! Will only rent from this location in the future! Top notch business!

name: Bill Pesnell
text: I have rented from this location numerous times. Without fail, and consistent on each and very rental, the manager Sabrena, and the staff have been polite, extremely helpful, open to suggestions, and overall, a joy with which to work. Not once have I ever had an issue. I would recommend that potential new customers overlook the one-off bad review because everyone has a bad day now and then. Big picture, Sabrena and the crew will bend over backwards to help any way they can. I will not rent from any other vendor or location if at all possible. Five Star service without a doubt.

name: Justin Hardy
text: I needed a dolly on short notice, Sabrena and her crew came through with flying colors. She was extremely courteous and very personable. I'll definitely be coming back to her for any future needs.

name: Chelsey Berry
text: Sabrina and everyone else were absolutely great! Very nice and polite and helpful. The place is really nice and clean. Sabrina came out to our truck while we were unloading into our storage to do the paperwork to return the truck. She saw that we had our baby with us and wanted to help us get out of there faster! Would recommend to everyone!

text: Nice employees , bad prices who which constantly went up.

name: Nate
text: My head gasket on my truck blew.  I need a truck for work and they have the best rates in town.  The staff are very helpful too.  I never had a bad experience with this uhaul.

name: Molly Hill
text: General Manager Sabrina  is rude, mean and disrespectful! She loves to hang up on customers, and over charge them. Don’t do business with her ever. Just plain nasty. She uses her authority in the wrong way manner. Not fit to manage anyone!!

name: cece tarver
text: The worker Paul  at this location lied about a free month when he overheard me and my sister talking about taking our things to another storage facility because they have a 1 month free promotion and he says so do we now fast forward a month later and I have late fees and liens in my property because he lied. You can never get anyone on the phone no matter what time of day it is. Also I have called corporate several times spoke with someone named David Reed who was very short and nasty because he kept saying you have to call the store and speak with them when I explained that no one is on the office when I get off at 6. Even though I was told they are there until 7. So I was told on Thursday that he would call me back by 1:00 that day to discuss this (remind you this is the guy who lied to me.) Still haven't spoke with the manager at this facility and I thinks it's because they know they messed up. So for 3 weeks I have been given the run around and still no district manager or nothing. I will say this how ever it turn out from thus point I WILL NOT NOR WILL I RECOMMEND THIS UHAUL COMPANY TO ANYONE! Now the lie is it's only if you are moving one way (BUT WHO MOVES OUT OF STATE AND PUT THERE THINGS IN A STORAGE IT MAKES NO DENSE AT ALL!!!!!) Save your time and money and go to another place. The manager at the location up the street is worse his name is Antonio. Don't know why any of these people got into customer service cause clearly they are not cut out for this job. They say you pay for what you get so buyer beware this is what I got lesson learned that's for sure!!!!!!!

resp.text:
Hello Terry Hinton,

Thank you for leaving us feedback. We are disappointed to hear that your experience was not a positive one.
We have taken several steps investigating this situation. There were no suspicious signs of activity through our gate system. Upper management is carefully investigating further. We take pride in serving our tenants and will make this situation right!

name: Barrie Fausz
text: Tell us Self Storage-Arlington Park was a wonderful experience at a difficult time for us. The manager, Curt Blankenship, was very helpful! We started with one unit, but as the moving process progressed, we realized we needed multiple units. On short notice Curt arranged making units as close together within the property as possible available to us, and kept the paperwork as painless as possible by email. The facility is clean and well maintained. Overall a 5 star experience!

resp.text: Thank you so much for this excellent review. Curt is a wonderful asset to our team, we're lucky to have him. Have a fantastic day Barrie!

name: Angel Warren
text:
Mr. Curtis was absolutely wonderful. I walked in and thought, oh my goodness I am going to be here forever because there were 3 customers and one staff person. Nope, I was totally wrong. I truly appreciated the detailed information and how efficient yet very, very thorough he was.
I checked out two other storage companies in this area. One company off Martin Rd quoted me a price of $220 for a 10x10. When the representative saw the shocked look on my face she begin giving me a lesson on supply and demand. Missing the fact of competition. Hands down I saved over $140 renting the same size unit from Arlington Park Self Storage.
Let me not forget to mention, how super happy I am that my unit was eligible for a moving truck at no cost. NO OTHER COMPANY OFFERED THAT!!!
I am 100% satisfied!!!!
Mr. Curtis, has some very delightful stories to tell during the process, which truly showed his love for EXCELLENT customer service.

name: Sarah
text:
This place is GREAT!! First of all, Curt the Manager is Awesome!  He gives excellent customer service and will tell you everything you could possibly need to know about Storage Unit rental.  He even gave me some ideas that I didn’t think about.
I was looking online and calling to ask questions to other storage facilities in Madison and it seemed as if most people were very short and rude an didn’t have time to speak to me. So I continued my search and I saw numerous 5 star reviews for Arlington Park Storage Facility, so I decide to go by and talk to them. I am so glad I did and I am now a tenant.
I got a Great price, a Free Lock and to top it off, I got free use of a Moving Truck to move my heavy items.  That alone saved me a lot of money.
This facility is so Clean, it has no bugs or critters anywhere, it has lots of room to get to your unit & be able to work at cleaning out your unit, it has 24 hr Gate Access and it feels so secure with all the cameras, fencing and Manager on site.   I am so glad that I found this place and I really appreciate having such a Great Manager as Curt is..  Thanks so much for all of your help!!!

name: Dave Sunderland
text:
Excellent location that is highly visible with good lighting.  Very well maintained.
The manager Curt is amazingly helpful and clear about options and requirements. He's got a wall of management awards in the office, and he deserves every one of them. He's very capable and on top of everything.

He was very professional and kind during this time of great stress! My mother was impressed at how promptly he processed the paperwork and got her back out so she could take care of other business. The service we received at Arlington Park Self Storage was exceptional. If you are looking for storage facility in Madison, this is the place you need to be.

name: Steven Power
text: Moved into town across the street from this storage unit. I contacted them because I wanted to store my primary vehicle away from the weather. They had absolutely no problem letting me store my car there. The price was perfect. Setting up my account was fast and easy. I enrolled in auto pay which made it nice so I didn’t have to worry about the bill every month. The staff is super friendly and helpful. They are very personable and easy to talk to. When they see you in the complex they wave hi and hello. The gate is automatic and only opens when it detects a large metal object from the inside. The staff graciously opened the gate for me when ever I dropped my car off and didn’t have a way to get out. Superb customer service. Unit was clean when I moved in and the whole compound is keep very neat and clean. All around great place and great experience. Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business and the gracious review Mr. Powers. We sincerely appreciate you as a customer and please let us know how we can be of further assistance!

name: Ana Bair
text: I called several places around the area needing a safe clean place to store our belongings. By the time we got our house all packed up it was Saturday and still no one had returned our call for a storage unit, and needed to be out our old house before Monday. I did a Google search and found extended attic and called​ Tom answered right away and set up a time to meet! He was able to set us up that day! The Extended Attic in Hazel Green is so kind, friendly, and helpful! The facility is very clean, safe, and we'll lite!  I recommend The Extended Attic to anyone!!!

name: David Sexton
text: Tom is extremely friendly and professional.  Getting set up with a storage unit was painless and he patiently showed me all the different sizes and answered all my questions without trying to upsell me.  The storage units are clean and well maintained, the facility is well lit and accessible 24/7, and there are cameras everywhere in case of theft or any other funny business.  Definitely recommend them.

name: Ronald Ashby
text: I have rented storage units from several different companies, in several different places and Your Extended Attic self storage is by far the best! I have never once felt unsecure about my belongings. It's always clean and easy to access and Mr Tom is one of the nicest men I have ever met. Lol, he makes everyone feel like we are all family. I watched and waited for this site in Hazel Green to open just because it was so convenient for my work. I almost call it my shop when I'm having an employee meet up with me.  I am truly glad that I have my unit and have no plans on letting mine go until the thought of retirement enters my mind and that's going to be several years down the road. I highly recommend this place and if you are ever a renter, I think that you will too!

resp.text: We appreciate the positive review. We want to provide everyone with the same service you have experienced.

name: Jelisa Williams
text: Let me start by saying Jarvis was an outstanding customer service representative! However, my experience with public storage has been far from pleasant. 2 months after moving into my unit I went by to check on my furniture (2 bedroom sets and a living room set) and was horrified when I was greeted by a dead rat at the front of my storage unit. The explanation given by the customer service representative Nyrie was, "We try to tell people not to leave food in their unit. It probably came from another unit." Today I went in to close out my account and was told that although I was closing my account out today December 5, 2017 I would be charged until the end of the month. Originally I was told that the amount would be prorated however was later told that they no longer prorate because their competitors do not prorate. I followed up with the district manager Jennifer Sanders and was told that unless I kept my personal lock on the unit they would rent the unit out to someone else although I was charged for the remainder of december, which I must say I find inappropriate. She then proceeded to hang the phone up. Next time I will keep my business with grand slam storage. CHEAPER ISN'T ALWAYS BETTER!  YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR!

text: I was trying to figure out the logistics with my truck/tow rental, and the Uhaul call center was not very helpful and often had a 20-39 minute wait. I went in and talked to Anthonio, the General Manager, and he got everything figured out! He was very professional and helpful.

name: Shan Key
text: Worst customer service I have ever seen anywhere.  Had a scheduled appointment with them to install a hitch at 9:00. This was the first available spot two weeks ago. Did arrive 30 min late. Girl at counter was nice and said it would be ready in approximately 1.5 hours. Left it for 2.5 hours and came back. Car has not been touched. I drove an hour to get there and an hour home. Wrecked half a day. Asked for a full refund. Asked for the manger and he yelled at me, saying “we call you when ready”. I asked was it complete and he yelled “does it have a hitch on it?”  He didn’t know or care and walked outside to see. I asked for the contact info of his manager. I called him and all he said was we let you down and I will talk to manager. They should have put the car on the rack, and knocked it out and offered some sort of discount. I leave on vacation tomorrow so no hitch, no trailering. I wouldn’t spend a dime here ever again, and it’s no wonder there rating is so low here and on y e l p.

name: Brandon Jones

This is because they have no idea what they are doing.  I'm surprised they can figure out how to unlock to doors to open in the morning.  Don't waste your time.  If negative stars were an option, that's the rating I would give this location.

Called to ask a question and the lady that answered was super rude. I asked if they had a place for bands to practice bc some storage units offer that. She told me no, which was fine. I told her that someone on Facebook had told me they offered that and she literally snapped at me and said "There better not be any bands practicing in MY storage units."

I'm not offended that she doesn't want band practicing, but to go off on me like that was super unprofessional.

name: Callie Hudspeth
text: The place is over run by fire ants in the back near theclimate controlled units and none of the units have any source of light inside so you either have to bring a flash light or have night vision. Also they turn the lights off in the  climate units and that is not safe at night nor is the lack of motion lighting on the  buildings in the back

resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about the ants we will make sure to retreat the property this week! We will also check our outdoor security lights to make sure they are all functioning properly! As for the Interior lighting, the hallway lights can be turned on while you are in the building and we ask customers to turn the lights off when they leave to save energy. For lighting inside your unit, you are welcome to use a magnetic led light that will attach to any of the metal surfaces in the unit. Please feel free to call our office if you have any other questions or concerns! Customer feedback helps us to improve our facilities and customer experience.

name: Phil Blackwell
text: Weird house in the middle

resp.text: While the house at the facility may seem strange, it was there long before the storage buildings were. The land around the house provided us the opportunity to expand our storage unit offerings for our customers, including additional climate controlled buildings and large 12x30 & 12x25 units.

text: This place will give you a great introductory rate, then they will increase your rates through the roof. I have had 6 huge increases in two and a half years!  I'm paying triple what I started paying, yet they offer a unit the same sizes as mine, for a third of what I'm paying.  There are  other storage facilities around Birmingham that are better and don't have such shady business practices. This is a classic bait and switch tactic.

resp.text: I am sorry you had an unpleasant experience could you please call your storage facility ask for Heidi we would like to go over your account and see what took place that does not sound right.

name: Andy Kerns
text:
The staff are all friendly but the management policies are absolute trash and borderline criminal. Expect to have them randomly turn off autopay so they can charge you usurious fees!

We were charged $40 in fees, about 25% extra on top of the unit rent, for just 9 days late. They even locked us out of our unit to charge another fee to take the lock off. Again, all just days late, not even close to a month behind. Absolutely insane.

resp.text:
Hello Andy, we are sorry to hear that you had trouble with your payment. Prior to any late fees being applied, it is our procedure to call customers to inform them that their payment is coming due, with reminders and options on how to pay. We certainly apologize that this did not help you avoid late fees, but we want to help our cstomers have the best possible rental experience. If there is anything further you'd like to let us know, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team

I have had a large unit at this location for a number of years. I signed a contract for an agreed to amount and they have increased the amount each year since becoming Smply Storage. It’s now to the point that I’m going to move my items to another location with better pricing.

Same issue with iStorage. Just got a notice for going up over 50 a month.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear about your experience. Please email social@simplyss.com at your earliest convenience, and we will try to help sort this out. Thank you!

name: Tremaine Sudduth
text: Customer service with Darius is great and clean facility.

Tremaine, thanks for leaving us a stellar review. We take our feedback very seriously, and it is always great to see that work is paying off.

Sincerely,
iStorage Birmingham - Highway 280

name: Chadwick Parish
text: Relocating and needed a storage unit.  I went to Simply Self Storage and was impressed with the time Darius took to show me the physical size of the units and tour of the facility.  I ultimately went with a 10x10 climate controlled unit, and the drive in feature of the facility is a nice bonus.  The only negatives here are that some halls have 36 inch doorways, which could make moving large items in and out more difficult.  Also, they do not yet have elevators, so ramps are used to move supplies to the 2nd floor units.  Elevators are supposed to be installed in the next couple months according to Darius at SSS.

name: Rachel Stroom
text: Staff is warm and professional. Scharlotte made my experience there the best i have had in any customer service interaction.

name: David C
text: Rented unit for three months between relocation to new job.  Facility is clean and staff is friendly and professional.  Could not have been easier to setup storage.

resp.text:
David, thanks for leaving us a stellar review. We take our feedback very seriously, and it is always great to see that work is paying off.

Sincerely,
iStorage Birmingham - Highway 280

name: John Fuqua
text: I have had a unit at the Inverness location for many years. Since the Business became Simply Self Storage it has gone down to new lows. I find it difficult to get in my unit with access and most importantly I do not believe the air conditioning is working. I like most here pay an incredible amount of money for a climate controlled unit and it is NOT!! The rear door was out for months and no lights in the back hall make the once excellent business a unacceptable storage location. The rates have gone up like clockwork and with a great deal of new competition I believe it is time to check them out. How sad.

resp.text: John, we are sorry to hear about your experience. Please email social@simplyss.com at your earliest convenience, and we will try to help sort this out. Thank you!

name: Jake Silcock
text: Horrible. I originally left a 5 star review because the property manager that I worked with setting up the account was great, but after using the service and closing my account I was still charged another 4 months. I emailed, called, and repeated and never could get anyone to answer or respond. The sales line will answer on the first ring so call them and try to get transferred if you can not get in contact.

resp.text: We are sorry to hear that you had a less than stellar move out experience. Moving out should not be a challenge to our customers, nor should getting the help and attention that they need when they encounter a problem. Your comments have been brought to the attention of our district and regional managers to find a way to streamline the process. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Baker Swedenburg
text:
If I could give negative stars I would. I've tried for 2 weeks now to cancel my unit as we have moved everything out. I've called the store manager multiple times and left messages, sent emails, and have even tried the district manager twice and left messages. I cannot get anyone on the phone or anyone to call me back. So now of course I'm being charged for another month because no one will call me back to cancel. This is while the unit is sitting empty by the way.

Caution to future people needing a storage solution. This is not it. Once they trap you, you cannot cancel. Ridiculous.

resp.text: That's the last thing that any business would want the customer experience to be. Moving out should be a seamless process, and should never require reaching out to multiple managers. This is not what we expect from our team, and apologize that this has been your experience. You will be contacted by the district manager and receive a refund for this most recent charge. If there is anything else, please contact us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: Shana Foshee
text:
After selling my home I needed a clean, secure, climate controlled temporary home for everything I owned and worked so hard for. I needed someone I could trust.

Some people may think there is not a lot to consider when renting a storage unit. You pay your rent, visit your storage unit when you need to get something or put something in, and that's all there is to it. I disagree.

Nate, the property manager treated me like family from the time I walked into the office. After all, I am basically moving into his house.

Although I did not see Nate for five weeks while he protected all of my belongings, when I walked into the main entrance, an hour before they opened, he was already there and greeted me by name with a smile.

Moving is stressful. Do yourself a favor and let Nate take care of you and your belongings until you can take your belongings back home with you.

name: Lakia Williams
text: If more stars were possible, I would definitely give more . I have been looking for a storage for over the past few weeks and wasn't getting any luck on a 10x10. I just put on a waiting list with GrandSlam and would get a call once something came available. Amy called me on yesterday and was excited to let me know they just got the size I needed available. She was very helpful and made me aware that this size storage goes every quickly. I made my purchase and very relieved that I can stop looking. Amy is awesome !!! It's been hard trying to get over there and look at the unit BUT Amy took the time to personally send all of my documents AND even record videos STEP by STEP on how to enter the building and get the my unit . That was extremely nice and sweet of her to do that . I will definitely recommend this location to anybody I see OR know looking for nice, recommendable storage. THANKS AMY . HAPPY THANKSGIVING !!!!

name: Drew Hall
text: My auto-bill declined and no notification was sent out until the account was delinquent. They admitted it could be a fault of their own system - still would not remove the charge. Sure it's only $20.00 but the principal of poor customer service weighs much heavier. Been there for years. Time to start shopping around I suppose.

resp.text:
Mr. Hall,
I apologize that you were not notified of your card declining until after the account was delinquent. While the decline was not the fault of our system, but with your card, I have reviewed your account and have confirmed your outstanding payment history and have credited your account the $20 fee. I do apologize for any inconvenience or frustration this may have caused you and want you to know that we have made this a priority to reach out to customers as soon as possible to avoid any late fees. We appreciate having you as a customer and look forward to serving you in the future for all of your self storage needs.
Thanks,
Corporate Office

name: Phillip Powell
text: Do not believe the picture you see on the Google search because this place looked nothing like the picture.  When we first saw the location we were immediately concerned about security and it turned out we had a right to be concerned.  We moved in on a Saturday and the following Saturday we moved out because someone was obviously trying to break into our unit.  The only thing that saved the $10,000 worth of stuff we had in our unit was our lock.  The day we moved out I showed management the damage to our lock and I was told I would only have to pay for the week I was in the unit and "I will have a talk with my security person".  That turned out to be a lie when a month later I was told they would not refund me any money because "my stuff wasn't stolen".  Poor security( if there even is security provided) and for very poor customer service.  Please stay away from this site.

name: Ashley Crews
text:
Customer service was great.  Ms. Christy was lovely. She gets 5 stars. However, the facility is nice at first sight.  But I do wish that there were flat beds available for large loads (less loading/unloading trips) versus the tiny ones (several tiny loading/unloading trips).  Compared to my last storage facility it's iffy.  My last one had the works as far as hauling tools/equipment for multiple people one time at both entrances.  But it was an across town move so I need the quick access and convenience.  Plus I hear they increase rent ever so often.
My last one didn't....you're the same rate until your contract changes when you're done. This will be temporary storing.  Hoping the surveillance is kosher.  3.75 stars for now. #tryingtimes I couldn't be picky and so yeah.  #betterdaysahead

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to give us a review, Ashley. If you need anything in the future please don't hesitate to stop by the office or give us a call at (205) 206-9525.

name: Daniel Alcantara
text: Christy helped us today and gave exceptional customer service. Went out of her way to make sure we got the exact unit we wanted. Thank you very much for making the process very easy and enjoyable. Love the air conditioning inside!

resp.text: Thank you, Daniel. We appreciate your feedback and review. Please let us know if we can be of further assistance.

name: Mandi Bee Harris
text: Christy was amazing! She waited on us to get there which was last minute and close to closing. She offered me a mask instead of turning me away because I left mine at home. The units and building is very clean and professional looking. Completely climate controlled! No evidence of bugs or rodents!

resp.text: Hi, Mandi Bee. Thank you for your positive review! Please reach out to (205) 206-9525 if you ever need any assistance.

name: Janette Smith
text: This place is so nice and the people that work there are so amazing. Extra Space Storage is the place you need to go if u need a storage.

name: Lilly Wheeler
text:
Kristy is the BEST! I considered Uhaul first and had the worst experience, they were rude and seemed like they could care less.

When I called extra space kristy was extremely knowledgeable and in person showed me everything I needed to see in the building so on my moving day so I wouldn’t have any issues. The building is updated and clean! Access is easy you have a personal code. There’s a massive loading dock and elevator making it easy for personal use or moving company’s to access.

Payments are automatic and Kristy let me know this upfront. Insurance is required and it’s 16$ a month for storage units you value at 3000$ or less.

Thank you Kristy!!!

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Lilly! We're so thrilled you have had a positive experience with Extra Space Storage. Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need anything.

text: Signed up over the phone, very painless. Assistant manager made every effort to me a unit nearer to the elevator, which was a huge help. Unit space is very clean. Plenty of parking outside for cars, trucks, or even larger larger U-Hauls.  Couldn't be more pleased!

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Robert. Thank you for choosing Extra Space Storage for all of your storage needs. Please let us know if you have any questions.

name: Shawn Powe - Williams
text: Online sign up was easy. Wasn’t happy I couldn’t view the storage space before I signed a lease and paid  due to COVID. I received a call 15mins after signing up asking for my credit card information over the phone to complete the process, which was odd because I paid online. Be honest and tell your customer your signing them up for automatic payments. I have no issue with automatic payments, unless I don’t know a bill is on automatic payments.

name: A'Marrie
text: I needed a storage space last minute and this one was perfect. It's located only a few minutes from my current residence and it's in close proximity to UAB. There weren't a bunch of bullcrap fees or ridiculous rates, which I ran into with other Storage companies. I can't remember their names off-hand, but each person that I spoke with was kind and very helpful with helping me get my unit. It's super affordable and just the right size for all of my things. By the way, I'm a struggling college student so when I say affordable, I mean it. All units are indoors so you don't have to worry about your belongings molding or rusting from the weather and they have dollies right near the elevator and front entrance. I'm really glad I found them when I did, it definitely alleviated some of my worries with transitioning to a new residence.

resp.text: Hi, A'marrie. We appreciate your positive review. Please call (205) 206-9525 if you have any questions.

name: SARAH DAUBACK
text:
Edit: I rented a unit for $29.99 per month. I was charged $40.00 this month for the same unit. I was NOT told the unit would increase even though it is a month-to-month contract. I will be moving my things out after this month. To tell a customer one price and then up the charge the second month $10.01 from 29.99 to 40.00 is bait-and-switch plain and simple. Find somewhere else to store your belongings. I shudder to think how much it will be next month.

******
Visited this morning and Christy was wonderful. She gave me a tour of the facility, explained the rental fees, insurance, hours and answered all my questions. Highly recommend.

resp.text: Welcome to Extra Space Storage, Sarah! Hearing that you had a positive experience renting with Christy is the best thing we could hope for! Your recommendation means a lot to us. Stop by our office if you need anything!

text: So we had the best movers move us into ExtraSpace downtown. Thankfully Road Runner moved us into this amazing facility and Christy is handling our storage. All our fine antiques and pictures from around the world are secure! Security is top notch! The movers and staff are 5-Stars!!! I’m just so happy that everything is working out like we could have only wished and prayed. ExtraSpace and Road Runner have been a blessing to our family. 😍

He then starts texting and I ask him to contact Brad who I set the appointment with. He said that he was texting him that Brad was at a  meeting. By this time I was angry   .  I called CTU down the road and they will have my stuff in tomorrow and install tomorrow afternoon.. Been there for years...miss the nice old owner... ...Rat poop all over and everything's ate up....rat and mouse infestation bad!!!!!! Brian brand

resp.text: Hello Mr. and Mrs. Brand. Upon review of your account with us we have changed your due date twice in the past year and a half at your request.  Our rate remains $95 for the size unit you were in, not $160.  We have treated the facility for fire ants so thank you for bringing that to our attention.  We also treat for mice and there is no infestation. Thank you and have a great day.

text: Very clean, convenient, safe, and easy to access for a self-storage facility. Would highly recommend to all those relocating to Huntsville, AL.

name: Dan Halcomb
text: I’ve stored items at The Guardian for at least the last four years (really, I’ve lost count), and have been very pleased. Access is easy but secure, the hallways and bathrooms are always very clean, and the manager is incredibly responsive. I’ve needed to change from multiple units to a single unit as I’ve incorporated stored items into my home, and then I finally got to the point where I could downsize my single unit. The Manager has always been so helpful finding available spaces in the complex that perfectly suit my needs at the time. I highly recommend The Guardian!

resp.text: Thank you so much Dan!  We appreciate you choosing The Guardian for your storge needs.

name: Clint Patterson (clintpatty)
text: This place is very well managed, especially for a storage unit facility. The owner is responsive, people clean regularly and it shows, multiple efforts are taken to discourage and/or find illegal drug activity, the only accepted form of payment is a credit card, it has all the dollies and carts I needed, very reasonable hours for accessing the secured entrances, and it's climate controlled. I never saw anything sketchy going on there the whole time I rented. I would use this place again if I had another move that required it, and this place would be a first choice for business use.

resp.text: Thank you Clint for taking time to post a review of our facility.

name: Christina South
text: Best self storage in Huntsville. Safe, inside storage that is clean and bug free. A climate and temperature controlled storage unit was important and the location is great. It is easy to get onto the interstate and quickly get anywhere in Huntsville. Highly recommend.

text: Never had a problem with the storage unit.  Facility was always nice and clean.  Whenever I had to enter the premises, I always felt safe. I would not hesitate in recommending the use of this facility to anyone with storage needs!

name: Paul Burns
text: Great facility.  Very clean.  I like the kiosk instead of having a person there.  Seems much quicker, and it doesn't have "mood" swings, lol.  The first time I stopped by to take a look at the place, I reviewed the kiosk and other info.  I called the number posted there because I wanted to see the units.  A lady (I believe her name is Pam), said she would come right then and show me around.  Didn't take her long at all to show up.  She was very, very nice, and I was thankful that she took time out of her day to come show me the place.  Needless to say I rented a locker, and not too long afterwards, upgrade to a larger size.  I used them for several years until I made room at home to move everything back.  The secure entry points is very nice and convenient.  The dollies, hand trucks, and other moving devices were very helpful.  I will definitely use this place again if I ever need some extra space.

resp.text: Thank you Paul.  So glad you Trusted The Guardian for your storage needs.

name: Darean Parker
text: I left to go on a deployment earlier this year. I left my car with this storage company. I was gone around 4 months. I felt good leaving my car here because they had a fenced it storage area that was secured by a gate and code, they also had cameras. I  called and emailed to check on my vehicle on a regular basis. Coming off deployment i had no problem getting a shipper to come get my car and also i got confirmation from the company that the car was being picked up and shipped. I would definitely store here again. Thanks Guys!!!

resp.text: Thank you Darean.

I was able to get the storage space I needed without any difficulties because she explained online is an option and not a necessity. I obtained my my storage space.  Also I will most definitely refer anyone that needs a storage space to Public Storage on Lorna Road where Ms Juanita is the office manager. Ms. Juanita is an asset to your company. name: Christy Jameson
text: I recently vacated my space on August 2, 2020.  The previous day on the 1st I spoke to the manager on-site.  She was very nice and very customer service friendly.  I spoke about vacating my space so I wouldn’t be charged for another month.  It didn’t seem like a problem, she mentioned coming to get her when I was  finished, and I even made mention that I may not be done that day.  I was told no problem.  I came to the office on the 2nd at 10:00 am, let her know I was out, it swept clean and empty.  I then at that time asked if the auto-debit would still go through on my account as has been done religiously for 2 years, she said yes but that the pro-rates refund amount would be returned in approximately 5-7 days.  Today is a week and a half later, I tried to contact the site, spoke with an extremely rude customer service rep (NOT the on-site staff for clarification), and after with the District Manager Jordan. I was informed that I would not be receiving any money back as the rent is month to month and nothing would be done-however when I moved in I was pro-rated for days then? That it was policy....I fully understand that, I deal with policy every day-I am also have a responsibility to act fairly and not hide beyond policy and take care of my customers.  When I asked specifically (and while in the office ON THE 1st) when I would receive the difference back-that would have been the time to be upfront, transparent and honest about the truth about the intent to not refund the remaining days on my unit.  If I would have not been told a refund was coming I would have stayed the month-and not called regarding my pro-rated refund.  If that wasn’t what I was told why would I be calling? Bottom line here, I moved up the street to Extra Space Storage, rented the same size unit for $18/month.  I was paying Public Storage $89 after 3 increases over 6 mos.  for the same size unit.  At this day in age a simple apology for the miscommunication and an effort to reimburse me something would have been appreciated and seen as compromise, the lack of an attempt to make it right is unacceptable to me.  It’s not the $89 at this point it’s the principal of managing my expectations as a consumer.  Please go up the street to Extra Space Storage, who were very decent about not wanting to steal their customer by the way, business is business.  The pro-rated refund would have been easier at this point instead of a negative google review and friends that also rent there and now will know to relocate.  Hope it was worth it, I do plan to make further calls.  At this point I do want my money over the principal of standing up for myself and what is right.  By the way, I work for a large property management company in town and in 2 other states that I travel, we were using Public Storage on our marketing material for new move-ins to our apartments and giving them this location in just Birmingham.  That will be changing.  Hiding beyond policy is one thing, refusing to see your company miscommunicated and screwed up is another.

name: Tony Canterberry
text:
These folks are excessively rude & non-communicative. My wife and I own a retail business and needed extra space for sorting and storing inventory. For over 2 weeks, he told us he'd have a unit available.

He refuses to speak over the phone, rarely responded to our texts, and when he did respond, he was abrasive, short, and rude.

We reached out 4 different times on the days he told us it would be available, and each time he was progressively more condescending and rude.

The unit was supposed to be available Monday, and we moved several pallets worth of merchandise to be ready. Of course, the unit wasn't ready. When my wife contacted him today (Friday), he yelled at her, telling her a broken door spring was the reason he lied about the unit for over a week.

As a local Google guide and local business owner, I don't like leaving bad reviews for local businesses, but this place is just plain bad.

name: Lesia Bell
text: We had already set up to have a 10 foot , but when we got there to pick up  ,we were informed it was not available for the time we needed.  The lady was very rude. We would not recommend  to anyone.

resp.text: We are sorry about this Lesia. We are not Uhaul corporate only a dealer site that works off of truck rental commissions.  We are just an intermediary.  Uhaul corporate took our truck that was supposed to be rented to you from our place of business.  Unfortunately, that is sometimes out of our hands if Uhaul leaves us no equipment to rent.  We are asking for your forgiveness.  The truck was simply not available even though it showed in our system it was available.  We wish you the best.

text: I have stored with Huntsville Lock and storage for over a year. I can't tell you how accommodating and helpful their staff is! If you are considering a storage facility CHOOSE THIS LOCATION! text: A great place to store your stuff. Very helpful staff!

name: David King
text: I've been a long term tenant that pays annual rent in advance. Since Huntsville Lock Storage has taken over, my unit price has increased twice. Both increases came on my anniversary renewal date. The new owners have only been in place for 1 1/2 years. When I questioned the price increases I was told that it was an industry standard and due to operating expenses and improvements made to the property. Thanks for the second exit gate and the gravel drives with pot holes. One of the main reasons for moving to the previous Winchester Road Storage was that I was guaranteed a unit price that would never increase, as long as I was long term and paid in advance.  Randy was more about business relationships than the all mighty dollar. The new  owners would be wise to follow this principle.

name: Victor Burlingame
text: Glad to be out of our storage unit here. We were lured in with a move-in special that was never the price they promised. Then they promised a referral payment to the person that referred us that also never happened. we signed up several days early before needing the unit and told them we needed it ready by Sunday when we had planned on moving all our equipment in... well Sunday arrived, we had 4 guys and two trucks of equipment ready to be unloaded except they still had their company lock on our unit and wouldn't answer their phone, not even the emergency number. We had continued issues with billing and of course now that we informed them we had moved out, they said they couldn't do anything about the billing issues and hung up on us. Their excuse was the number of units they had made it confusing. ok, it's weird that you can't handle taking a payment that you have a contract stating once a month. I have pretty basic storage needs but wow, this place ended up being more trouble than it was worth and we pid more than we were supposed to every month. Just go to the place down the street to Smith Store-it, Ryland mini storage, or any of the dozen other places that can handle your business professionally

resp.text:
Effective this week, we are under new management.

Victor, we are sincerely sorry for the events that took place with your move-in and any other items.  With respect to your billing issues we are unaware of what issues you are referring too... simply put, your card did not process. I would love to discuss this with you further and see what can be done to make it up to you.  Our managers strive to take care of all of our customers.   Customer care and service is of most importance to us. We value all of our customers and always strive to offer the best service and response to our customers.   Please contact us and we are anxious to discuss further to alleviate any of your concerns.

Sincerely, Ownership

name: raymondcolley
text: I sold my home in Alabama and needed to move and store my goods until I could find a home in Tennessee. My PODS sit in their facility for 6 months until I purchased my new home. The PODS were delivered at the perfect time for my hired muscle to unload. We had no damage to anything. All the drivers were extremely courteous and professional. We would definitely recommend to all and will use again if I need to move in the future.

resp.text: Moving isn't the easiest thing to do, so we're excited to hear we helped make the transition to your new home as simple as possible. Thank you for choosing PODS!

name: Katie Bieneman
text: Absolutely loved my experience with PODS. It was super smooth. Loved that with each drop off and pick up it was the same person/crew, just made everything much easier. Everything was super clean. My stuff was well maintained within the POD even after being transported from Alabama to Nevada. Would definitely use again if I need to and recommend to anyone who is considering using them!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to spread the word about your awesome experience, Katie. We have your back when you need us again!

name: Bette Cobb
text:
A zero is too high for this company.  My personal things were put in two storage containers 6 years ago by a business that cleaned up our water damaged house.  Five years ago that business we got to do the clean up went out of business and the two containers were taken out of our yard with my belongings and without notice.  I am not allowed to have access to them because I don't have the pin # to the account. Five years ago, we got no help from the local business or main company.  We tried to get everything take care of then and couldn't get in touch with the business that worked originally with us and PODS would only talk to the original business that was no longer in existence.
So, skip to a week ago I get a letter that informs me of the amount that is owed on the two pods since 2016 and will be put up for auction at the end of the month.  I am a third party and have tried to work with this company - I called and asked about the letter and was told it was a mistake and I shouldn't have gotten it.  Yet, six years later I am still not allowed to get my families' things that are still in the storage units.  So, I was told that nothing could be done and my things would be sold at an auction on 29th of this month.  So, if I paid the $26,692 that was owed by the other company that contracted with Pods originally, could I get my things with no PIN #?  I would just like some help and it seems like no one cares at this company.  There needs to be some way to work this out.  I would like to try and get some help with this because it was not my fault the other business did not pay - but you would think it is.

resp.text: We can understand how you're feeling and would like to research this further, Bette. Can you please email socialmedia@pods.com with the customer ID number or any additional information to help locate the order.

name: Teshika Holmes
text: I’m no longer pleased with this service. I have had to contact customer service and they are unprofessional with long hold times, they have messed my account up and constantly charging my credit card after already paying hundreds of dollars already.  Then their collections department have contacted me was unprofessional. I’m to the point where I would like to cancel everything and go with another moving company. Nothing has gone smooth with this company. I’m on a crunch already with an apartment I have to be moved out of already. Each day I call this company between customer service and billing nothing gets straightened out ever! Will never recommend or use this service again!!!

resp.text: We certainly don’t like to see this, Teshika. If you’d like to chat, please email socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID and additional details.

After asking me who I was again, I told her to lose my phone number that I was a customer seeking information and because of her terrible attitude had lost my business. She replied that she didn't want my business. Good enough. DO NOT GO TO Mt. Carmel Storage if you want to be treated like a human. Rude. Rude. Rude.

name: T-ron Musiq
text:
This is by far the best storage facility in the area. Primarily due to the staff. I park my vehicle here and use it every two weeks or so. Every time i am greeted by the lovely Lawanda and when I leave I am also greeted by her aswell. When it’s cold outside and I park my car and awaiting my ride she always invites me in the office to stay warm, and when it’s hot outside and I’m awaiting my ride from dropping of my car at the Storage facility she offers water. Southern hospitality at its finest!!

One occasion battery died in my vehicle when I went to pick it up, and guess who was the only one on the shift...Lawanda Wood. She went out of her way to help, even providing me with jumper cables and using her own personal car to jumpstart my car, and did it with a smile! Without her I would have had to call a tow truck! She really saved the day!

I’m not sure if anyone will read this but I had to write a review and hopefully she is recognized and rewarded for her continuous outstanding work and customer Service at the Martin road location. Thank you for always going above and beyond for your customers. That’s why I pick this location over more fancy places. People like Lawanada make it worth it. :-)

Sincerely,
Your happy customer

Theron Lewis.

text: Convenient location. Friendly staff. But they keep raising the rates and did nothing to get rid of the mice in my unit.  I had to personally get them out. Insurance didn't cover any damages and I am still having to enter my unit with caution because of the critters trying to move back in.

text: I can’t say enough about this facility. These guys are awesome! Year after year they donate a unit to the Tent City Project in efforts to help our city’s homeless community. Joel and his staff are simply amazing. If I could get them 10 stars, I would! I recommend over any other!

text: I was looking for the best prices that were near where my grandmother lives( the storage is for her), and decided to try this place. John went above and beyond for me. He showed me a space and gave me prices on said spaces, told me everything up front so that way there were no surprises. For that i will always be grateful thanks John for taking the time out for me and my questions.

text: Great place. Great service. Clean units. Cameras and fence. Plenty of room. Average prices.

name: Chase Downing
text: Aislinn had a great attitude and was extremely helpful. I would highly recommend to friends or family.

name: Carolyn Hastings
text:
I moved to Alabama recently, and I rented a storage locker from LifeStorage on rte 72 in Madison on the enthusiastic recommendation from a neighbor who had previous experience with them.

First, the facility has everything you might expect, and then some.  It is super clean, well lighted and well paved.  The security is excellent, with 24/day 7 days/week access to the lockers through a security coded gate. Todd and Joel are extremely helpful, and do everything they can to make the experience go as smoothly as possible. In fact, I even got a phone call from Todd last week to let me know that my lock hadn't properly engaged the locking mechanism -- so they even check to make sure that the individual lockers are secure.

I have rented storage lockers at four facilities in three different states.  I liked each of the places I dealt with, but this is definitely the best.

Highly recommended.

name: Jason Troutman
text: They were very helpful and polite!  Also a very convenient and secure system. I would definitely recommend to a friend.

name: Tanya Murray
text: After searching many self storage units co-located to my rental, I stopped in here at lunch on Monday. Todd discussed the various rental sizes and costs associated, including insurance and then took me for a tour of the facility actually opening a vacant unit to verify the size I had inquired about. I went back the following day and rented a unit. If you are looking for exceptional customer service that is what you will get from these guys. Very helpful, units were clean and prices are reasonable. Glad I stopped.

name: Brad French
text: Nice lady, decent prices. Would recommend

text: I was very impressed with the way Joel handled my inquiry.  Joel made sure I understood all aspects of renting a storage area.  He provided a tour of the facility including both external and climate controlled storage areas.  I rented my storage from Joel who is by far the best storage manager I have met.

text: Mr. Brian was extremely helpful and professional for my entire time I had my household goods in storage (4.5 years).  The facility was so clean and safe, which means a lot to me. A reasonable extension to this grace period for established long term customers would personally gain a 6th star in future reviews:)

text: This is a great place to get storage, the facilities are clean and well kept, the staff are awesome and always there to help when needed. name: B Royer
text:
Brittany Higdon is the best manager to serve store #351 in 5 years! Having personal experience with the operations of this company, she has the potential to be a top performer. Having rented here off and on for more than a decade, she has raised the standards back to what they were in 2012. Keep up the good work and tweak the small things.
To customers, this is the best facility to rent from if you want peace of mind that your things are safe and will be cared for, rent at this location.  Life Storage, formerly Uncle Bob's is a wonderful company to work for and they care about their customer base! Shout out to Williamsville!

name: Nick Denny
text: Let me begin with the positive: lots of room to enter the lot and maneuver.  That's where the good ends...  There are significant gaps in important information given online as well as from the employees.   You must bring a paper copy of insurance, it seems easy and somewhat a reasonable request, but they don't tell you till you arrive to sign...you have to either leave to print it or call your insurance company to fax it.  Also there is no agreed truck usage at this location, in fact there is no truck, there is a van at another location and its not free, you have to pay $20 for the commercial insurance...though the employee told me my personal vehicle insurance would work...paper copy.  Lastly, the size of the unit is 'nominal' meaning they are rounding UP to 10'x10' from the actual 9'x9.5'.  If I hadn't already gone through the hassle of signing and paying for the unit already, I would go somewhere else...

name: B B
text: The employees and staff of Life Storage are wonderful in helping their local community like thru The Tent City Project.  Any company who is willing to help and benefit their communities is a business I would want to associate with and do business with. Thank you!

name: D Lifeform
text: Shopping around for almost anything these days is often exhausting, frustrating, and disappointing. Therefore, it was a most pleasant surprise to find that customer service is indeed alive and well at the LifeStorage store #351 on Highway 72 West, in Madison, AL.  I would like to sincerely thank Joel Sherman, Store Manager, and Brittany, for their professionalism, as well as their kindness.  The fabulous customer service I received absolutely tipped the scales in favor of my renting a storage unit here, rather than at a competitor's store.  I was also extremely impressed with how immaculate the facility is, both inside and out.  I am quite pleased with the entire experience I had here and look forward to my future dealings with Joel and Brittany.  Thank you!

text: Very misleading! They claim to give you the first month for free but charge you anyway. When I questioned them about it I'm told " Oh we add the free month at the end of your contract". resp.text:
Hello T-Won, we are sorry to hear about your experience. In an effort to provide the best possible value to our customers, our first month free promotions apply to the first full month. That way, you can reap the full benefits of the promotion. Given the state of your unit, we would recommend getting in touch with the property manager directly to get the ball rolling on that maintenance request. Please let us know if there is anything else you might need by reaching out to us directly at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team
