resp.text: Thank you for taking time to provide feedback, Edgar Vasquez. If you would like to discuss your concerns further, please email feedback@istorage.com and provide your preferred contact information so that a member of our management team may reach out to you.

name: Tracy Wiggins
text: Couldn't rent storage from a better company. They are awesome

name: William Sanders
text: Somethings always will remain the same and that’s not necessarily a bad thing in a sense. Never had any problems here and I hope it can remain the same

name: Rene Petrey
text: Nicest folks you ever want to meet.  Family owned and operated.  Facilities are very clean.

name: Diane Trousdale
text: The people are extra nice. So far I have not had any problems.

name: Sam Wilkinsn
text: During covid-19 curfew, they locked me out of my storage unit before I had a chance to pay the bill. During coronavirus pandemic they erroneously locked me out of my storage unit before I had a chance to pay the bill, which wasted their gas and my time. I'm glad I went to the storage unit on my way to pay the bill. I'm glad I didn't pay the bill that night not knowing that they had locked me out. No love lost. I've heard horror stories from other people about this place.

name: Phyllis. M. Maguire - Brewer (Babydoll)
text: We were forced in a emergency situation to move out of the home we had rented and I moved in with some friends and my son did the same. We couldn't take the majority of our belongings and we rented a storage unit from auto pride. I have to say that I was more than happy with the entire process from beginning to end. They were knowledgeable and professional but had no problem being down to earth nice and friendly. If we should ever be in need again for a storage unit I will not hesitate to contact and use auto pride. I have also been very willing to recommend to my family and friends too!

name: Kim Davenport
text: Super nice owners, very clean units, good prices!

name: Joshua Rawson
text: Nice family

name: Phyllis Brewer
text: I was a customer recently and was very pleased with the service and entire experience

name: Dean Evrard

name: Tamia Heard
text: My experience at the #26599 location was great! Ebonie was so kind and extremely helpful! It’s not often that you come across people who truly want to help so I greatly appreciated her assistance!

name: Ebonie Craft
text: Rita is amazing! She made me feel ‘at-home’ instantly when I walked in today to meet with her about future employment at another location for Public Storage. I enjoyed our conversation so much, she was thorough and informative; I left feeling very excited for my ventures to come. All customers that stop in at this location can expect a warm greeting and smooth experience.

name: Alicia Watts
text: I had a great experience with this storage. Ebonie was very professional and showed nothing but southern hospitality. Would highly recommend!!

name: Stephanie Carson
text: Rita is a wonderful person that really knows her stuff. She was so helpful two years ago when I called public storage cause I was moving here from Memphis, Tennessee.. I am moving again, so I came back to public storage because of Rita. Every successful business needs a Rita.😎😎😎

name: Living The Dream
text: I’ve been renting here for about 8 months and find it is always very clean and well kept.  Rita is so helpful and friendly.   She is always there and even moves her lunch around to accommodate her customers’ needs.  When I needed a bigger unit, she helped me find the right size. I live in a different city now, but I won’t move from here because the customer service is so great!  ~Wendy

name: Anne-Marie Bevelander
text: Rita went above and beyond with her excellent customer service and friendly demeanor. We were impressed with how nice the facility is, air conditioning works well. We are happy we chose GS Public Storage.

resp.text: Our team strives to deliver an excellent self storage  and are glad you found this to be the case. Thank you for your comments.

name: Demetrious Zitsos
text: I have had at least one storage unit here for many years sometimes as many as 3 units. Rita has always been great to work with and has always been very helpful with any assistance I ever needed. The facility is always safe, clean and well maintained. I look forward to many more years of worry free services Rita provides here at Public Storage.

name: Scott Sperling
text: My experience at Public Storage in Gulf Shores was as good as it gets. Rita took great care of me and made sure I had everything I needed to get my storage bin set up. I highly recommend this facility 👍

text: Rita earned her 5 stars. She was great with explaining everything clearly and showing the process of entering my rental unit. It was a very comfortable transaction.

Great place I would recommend going here
Friendly people

text: Nice public storage, very clean & the employee I've met is friendly & helpful!

name: D Williams
text: We rented a unit at this Gulf Shores location today. Rita Ann was so helpful! The property is very clean, the unit we rented was spotless and the entire building is obviously well maintained. I would not hesitate to recommend this business.

name: Anne Laplante
text: Pay no attention to the office hours listed in maps if you need to buy boxes - half the time there is a sign on the door that the office is closed. Recommend calling first and if you never get to a person who confirms they are open, don’t go!

name: Michael Manker
text: I was in a bind and needed a small unit. Ann was absolutely fantastic and found the perfect storage unit for me. She even helped by walking me to the unit, finding a cart to help load my stuff, and walked my through the entire process. 10/10 ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

name: Leigh Ann Humphryes
text: Excellent service. Rita was knowledgeable and helped me to pick the right size unit for my needs. I dreaded having to move some things but she made it as pleasant as possible. Would recommend.

name: Stacy Green
text: If it wasn't for Rita, I would have never realized that the unit size I reserved online was NEVER going to be big enough to store all of my stff. She was so incredibly helpful every step of the way! Rita is a real gem.

name: Denise Lynn Gueltzow
text: Rita and Ann are very professional, willing to help, and make you feel very comfortable with your decision to use their storage facility. I would definitely recommend the Gulf Shores location.

name: Susie Pappas
text: Rita called me when I had accidentally left my unit unlocked. I have had a couple of opportunities to talk and work with Rita and I am always impressed with her kindness and professionalism. She makes the experience enjoyable.

name: Briant D
text:
From the first contact with Rita at Public storage to the final locking of  our 10x20 storage was SO easy! THANK YOU Rita.
Rita stayed in constant contact with us and took the time to understand our needs. She worked with her manager and they strategized a plan that took the worry out of our arrival and our storage needs.
Rita and Public storage are highly recommended by us. Extremely clean, practicing good health policies and great customer care.

name: Nikki Hahn
text: Ms Ann was awesome she's a pleasure to work with and was very kind and helpful. We have not only one but two units here

name: Megan Wallace
text: I have a time share and needed some helpful information on storage units in the area. I really appreciate Ann’s help and hospitality! She also provided me with additional information about the Gulf Shores area. I definitely recommend public storage! Thanks for your help Ann!!!

name: Leigh Ann C
text: We were looking for a smaller unit to store some stuff for the summer between a move. Rita was so kind and helpful to get us the right space for our needs. Having to move is such a hassle but she made this process so smooth & easy. If I have to store again in the area I will come back here for sure.

text: Very good customer service. Rita went over and beyond. A+ in my book.

name: Ron Gudgel
text:
My price increased significantly on two different spaces ($142 to $162 or 21.1% in 2018, $85 to $102 or 25.9% in 2019, $102 to $127 or 24.5% 2020); the climate control was turned up in the summer that increased humidity; and automatic light fixtures timed to go off too soon with some not fixed in over two years.  Ann was staff person who scolded me and then told me I was arguing when addressing her comments - she had been ok up until this occurred on the weekend of 7/25-26.........

(My comments were not succinct so hope this clarifies my review to indicate who & what upset me so you can take appropriate action.
Corporate policy price increases & low maintenance budget are the issues not this location per se, including Rita who's always been friendly & considerate or the personnel form Mobile who helped with the changeover to your company or the district manager - he even took time to fix my door a couple years ago...)

name: michael cameron
text:
On January 11, 2020, Rita and Ann did an outstanding job showing us a larger unit, answering our multiple questions and dealing with complications due to us sharing the unit with two other couples.
Both were very friendly, informative and accommodating.
Great job!!!
Michael  & Shirley Cameron

text: I would highly recommend Public Storage in Gulf Shores.  Ann was very helpful and explained everything very well. She took her time explaining the process and showing the units.

text: Rita and Ann were just so incredibly nice with helping me get setup. The process was quick and to the point. Ann walked me through everything, showed me the unit. We even bonded over being far from home. Definitely will enjoy my time here!

text: I was in and out very quickly thanks to Rita! Super clean establishment, and it was very easy to find.

text: Very clean and easily accessible. Ann and Rita are very kind and helpful. Ann even jumped my car off for me when my battery died in the parking lot! I highly recommend them.

text: Very nice and clean facility.  Rita was very knowledgeable and made the lengthy process fairly simple.  It is also very close so made it more appealing.  I would recommend!

name: Ashlie Harris
text: As soon as I reserved my unit online Ann gave me a phone call with more details and answered all of my questions! Rita gave me tour of my unit and helped me out with all of my paperwork and any other questions! Very reasonable pricing and so clean! I feel so comfortable storing my items here!

name: Dave Fountain
text: Very friendly, helpful and highly knowledgeable. The cleanest storage facility I've ever seen. Please save yourself time and call or stop in Public Storage in Gulf Shores right before the bridge in front of the airport.

name: Janie Williams
text: Thank you, Ann!!!! We Seniors need all the great help we can get,and you were that great help!!!!

name: Ronald Martin
text: Had occasion to work with  Ann and Rita to obtain a storage unit. Both were knowledgeable, courteous, helpful and a pleasure to do business with. The complex and individual units were clean and easily accessible. this is about the 5th time we have used storage units and by far the best experience!!!

name: Morgan Tidmore
text: Had a great experience. Rita was so sweet and  helpful. There wasn’t a question she didn’t know. Will definitely use again if needed

name: Jyl Cannon
text: Rita was amazing! She is so friendly and helpful! She made the process seamless, easy and quickly!

name: James Popejoy
text:
Ms.Ann has exceptional Customer Service ..knowledgeable ..clean facility ..definitely a good experience during a hectic move ..thank you. And just im amazed at how good she is at what she does and the person she is simply amazing.
WOW...

name: Jenny
text: Bait and switch. Cost to move in was SUPPOSED to be $25! I got there and was REQUIRED to buy a $20 lock from them. That got me to $45. Then they start rent at the first of the month...needless to say, I ended up paying TWICE the rate for 3 weeks worth of use. Holding my breath that my stuff isn’t stolen, because their lock can be picked by an expert they have on staff, so much for SECURE STORAGE!

name: Cynthia Jordan
text: The nicest and most qualified representative (Rita). Very clean and well run!

name: Lisa Gunter
text: Wonderful experience.  Ms. Rita was so kind and knowledgeable.  The facility was very clean and well maintained.

name: Wanda Ruth
text: Stopped in and picked up a few items from Ms. Debbie today. She was very polite and a pleasure to deal with.  Very knowledgeable about the products she sells. Will definitely be back if I’m ever in need of more boxes!!!

name: Jane Nelson
text: Came in to buy some packing products a few days ago and Lexi was the sweetest thing, she helped me get the right size packing paper and she mentioned that if I didn't need the box I was hesitant about buying she would be able to give me a refund if it was unused. She had such a great personality that I chose to come back today to pick up more paper and get some measurements on different sized boxes. Overall great experience and thank you for your knowledge and helpful advice! Will come again!

name: Charles Greer
text:
Facilities are nice, and onsite office staff are great!  HOWEVER...
BEWARE corporate "bait and switch" rates!  After six months, my online "deal" rate for my unit jumped from $89.00 to $104.00, an almost 17% increase.  Will the rate be $121.00 six months from now????

name: JULIE GREEN
text: Rita and Ann are very nice however the problem is the corporate office doesn’t care about people and situations!!  Evidently the people that moved out the bedroom furniture in the storage building left one thing and  for that Jennifer at the corporate office wants me to pay another $140 whatever..  they prorate only when you move in not when you move out!

name: Jessica Knight
text: Great customer service!! Will recommend highly!! Thank you to the lady  up front that worked with me!!

name: Don Carson
text: I moved here from Hernando Mississippi and needed two storage units . Rita was such a tremendous help in making that happen for me and so friendly when I got here. Just can't say enough about Rita going the extra mile.

name: April Barnett
text: Rita was very helpful and professional from beginning until the end. She answered every question and was able to get us what we needed to store our belongings.

name: Sue Schuler
text: I had to go into the office today to sign my new lease. The ladies that work in the office are just the sweetest things. The facility looks really nice with all the things that have been done. If you need storage I recommend the Gulf Shores location.

name: Joey Pease
text:
Great location and very  descent storage facility.The lady Ann was always very helpful and kind, unlike the last place i stored at.
That matters when you're irritated from moving stuff lol

name: John Pace
text: Rita was extremely helpful and made the process of renting a storage unit seamless and smooth.

name: Ron Eubank
text: Kudos to Rita at Gulf Shores! She helped me through an upgrade to a larger unit without any problems. I was already a satisfied customer, but every transaction counts and Rita shows that PS knows it.

name: SS S
text: The lady in the office was very helpful even with all my questions. I am giving the service I was given 5 stars. I made my reservation with the call center and was told what I would have to pay. I was NOT told I would have to purchase a lock and insurance. So I called my agent and everything was cleared up. The lock is a little hard to use but I feel like the security it offers is worth the price I paid.

name: Geremie Fresh
text: Mrs. Rita was wonderful. Thank you so much for all your help. I would highly recommend this location to anyone.

name: Lloyd Moore
text:
The folks that work their are great.  The facility is well maintained and clean.  They get two stars because of what I consider shady business practices by "Corporate".

I was just notified that the monthly storage rate was going up by 20%.  After some calls it seems like their units are staying full and there are "no special rates anymore".  We never knew we had a special rate.  It was the standard rate.

What they are doing is jacking up the rates in hopes folks will leave and they can get more for the units.  A 20% jump is a big increase for no reason at all.

name: Coralie Anne Farish Scott
text: Rented this morning. Rita was super nice & very informative. She made renting a unit here very easy. The unit itself is climate controlled and a code is required to get in the building and on the elevator which makes me feel safe about storing my belongings here.

name: Sherie Box
text: Great experience! Rita was courteous, helpful and friendly. She goes out of her way to make you feel welcome and informed!

name: Deborah Watts
text: Rita is wonderful to work with.

name: Colby Williams
text: Nice friendly fast showed us the difference sizes by taking us to different units and letting us look inside to see if it would fit everything we had to store got us in today.

name: Paige moore
text: This store has the BEST customer service! Ann is always so helpful. I feel so confident leaving everyone. Thank you, Ann and Public Storage!

name: Sarah Hadley
text: My experience with  Ann was awesome she's so helpful and friendly and answered all my questions and took care of everything in a timely manner and the storages are so clean and well kept. If you need a storage unit go see Ann in Gulf Shores she will always greet you with a smiling face.

name: Charles McCleese
text: This is my second visit here to see a unit. Linda made me feel comfortable during the rental process. She answered all of my questions with confidence and made me feel at ease. Thank you so much for everything you did to make this as easy as possible.

name: Jessica Parizo
text:
Mrs. Rita is amazing.

She goes above and beyond to help in anyway she can. You won’t need to worry about a thing when working with her. The facility was clean and well kept as well.

name: Ryan Patrick
text: I was truly impressed with how clean and nice the facility is. The young lady in the office was very patient with us as we decided if we wanted the unit or not. She was kind and sweet. Would recommend to my friends. Thank you.

name: J.D D
text: I want to say just how wonderful Rita and Linda are. I had a lot of trouble getting to Al but they made sure I had units when I got here. I am thankful for that. I am giving 5 stars to them. I wasn't happy about the insurance requirement or the lock purchase. However that wasn't their fault and they made it a smooth transaction.

name: Linda Oakes
text: The gals that are in the local office are outstanding, especially Ann.  The facility is very clean and well maintained.  My only complaint has to do with their price increases for no apparent reason.    We have had 3 price rate increases in 1.5 years, going from $130 to $150 to $182 ... I  believe their units are staying full, jacking up the rates in hopes folks will leave and they can rent at higher pricing.  We have been inconvenienced a few times, when they re-did the blacktop, we could not pull anywhere close to units, having to walk & carry, they closed a couple times with no email notice causing us to drive an hour only to find them closed!  I was more inline thinking we should get a credit for inconvenience.  We will be checking other locations/ as there are several new going up in the area but only because of price.  Give us a fair price break, for being a good customer and we stay.

name: Susie Collova
text: Rita was very pleasant, helpful and knowledgeable about her facility! Definitely would recommend this storage facility to my friends.

name: joey pease
text:
Thank you for great & fast service Ann.
I know my storage is in good hands!
Thank you

name: Brenda Perry
text: Terrific experience! Rita was able to work her magic and find space. Highly recommend!

name: Wendy Collins
text: I love this place, I felt like all of my belongings were safe and secure. TheTstaff was amazing! The  only thing that really upset me was when I told them I was moving out. It just so happened that I couldnt move in to my apartment until the 1st. So I went in to the office and they told me I would be charged for a whole month if I'm not out before the 1st,! I can't believe that they prorate if you move in in the middle of the month or whatever but if you move out they don't prorate even if it's only for one day you have to pay a whole month so I had to rent a U-Haul truck unload all of my stuff into a truck let it sit overnight and take it to my place to next day just so I wouldn't get charged for a whole month I think that's ridiculous!

name: Joshua Thacker
text: I paid up 2 months the on my storage unit and I moved out in a week.. They said they would refund me all the money I paid up to, okay!! I could use that to make my phone payment.. I waited 3 weeks for a 5 dollar check in the mail because that's how they refund money.. I will never ever in my life purchase a storage unit with Public Storage at any location.. I would advice going elsewhere Bec Public Storage will steal your money and way over charge you and do not pay up on the unit and move out they will keep your money..

resp.text: Hi Everett, thanks so much for your recommendation! We're glad Daniel was super nice and helpful with everything possibly needed! Stop by our office if you need assistance or have any questions.

text: I use to keep my things at SmithStoreit on Hwy 72, but once they sold out to Storage Sense, I moved my things to Ryland Mini Storage, Kelly knows her stuff and was super helpful from one manager to another, Kelly is the best, plus the brand new climate building is nice and clean, just how I like it! Keep up the hard work Kelly!

name: Karen Nabors
text:
If you are in business, it's not if a problem is going to occur it is when.  It is how a company recovers that speaks volumes to their customer service. Last week we had a really disappointing experience with an employee at Ryland Mini. After being denied access to a manager, I sent a message via Ryland Mini's FB Messenger page explaining our situation. The manager, Kelly, responded back very quickly.  She was on vacation, however she took the time out to call and speak with us directly. Kelly was very gracious, assured us the situation would be resolved and was very apologetic.  Kelly has always taken excellent care of us and continues to impress.
Ryland Mimi Storage is a business I can recommend with confidence. The units are extremely clean, pricing is very competitive and management is exceptional!

resp.text: Hi Karen, We are so sorry that you had a bad experience with our location. We have a high standard of  quality customer service for our tenants.  Our manager will be contacting you to make this right.

name: Natasha Worthy
text:
Brenda is rude and condescending. She discussed my account with someone who works for me. We were moving items out of storage to go into a bigger office. I wasn't moving completely out, just moving a few items. She mentioned I'd not paid my bill for the month (this was on the 1st-- the bill wasn't late). She mentioned this to my office manager who I'd instructed to get certain items from storage. I'd attempted to introduce my office manager to her a few days before and she wasn't there. When I spoke with Brenda, she told me she needed to know what I was doing. I told her she did not because I wasn't completely moving out. I had problems with her last year.

Do NOT rent from them! I'm actually moving from there because anyone who'd discuss, mention or otherwise engage in conversation about my bill to an unauthorized person is not to be trusted.

I complained about this two days ago and no one has even followed up with me. They don't care about their customers.

resp.text:
Hello Natasha, we are sorry to hear that you had a poor experience while renting with us, and we understand your frustrations here. We are following up with our senior management team on your behalf, and you should expect to be contacted shortly. If there is anything further that we can do to assist, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team

name: Tim Countess
text: This place is perfect for all my storage needs.  I have one unit that is climate controlled and protects my important items that are sensitive to heat/cold and humidity.  I feel my items are very well protected and the area is nice and secured.  Then my needs changed and had more items to store and the very friendly office staff was able to find me an outside unit in very short time.  I'm using that for shop and tool storage that can be outside.  The rates for both climate controlled and other storage are the most competitive anywhere around.  I also like the easy access location in Madison, along the BLVD and on a low traffic side street that makes entry and exit with my trailer and truck very stress-free.  Also there is plenty of room in both areas for your truck and trailer access to make loading and unloading a breeze.  This is the 3rd time over the past 7 years I've used this location and HIGHLY recommend checking them out for any needs you have.

resp.text: We greatly appreciate your continued support over the years, Tim. We are happy to help our customers as their needs change and our competitive pricing makes it all even better. Thanks for the recommendation! - Kiera

The unit was the right size everything fit in fine no problem, but the slide lock & the rollup door was messed up when opening and closing needs some maintenance. Will recommend this storage to friends.

resp.text: Thanks for bringing this to our attention, AJ. We will have someone take a look at it as soon as we can. We want our customers to know their items are safe and secure with us here at U-Lock-It Storage. We thank you for your business and support! - Kiera

name: BRANDY HOLT
text: I am very pleased with U-Lock-It Storage in all aspects. I have had several different storage units over the years and U-Lock-It has been the best hands down. The staff is friendly and helpful all the time, the facility is well kept and maintained, and the lighting inside and outside of my unit is great. The day I went in to see about renting my units, Christy took the time to sit with me and help me figure out just how much space I needed. Yes, most places do that, however, Christy didn't just try and throw specials at me, or get me to spend more money just to have extra space. She did however, get me the best deal for what I needed, then threw in the appropriate discounts! This particular U-Lock-It Storage location is the best! I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a place to store their things!

resp.text: We are absolutely thrilled to hear your experience with us was so wonderful, Brandy. Security and lighting is very important to us and is something we take very seriously, too. We will definitely pass along this message to management. We appreciate your business and taking the time to leave us a 5-star review. Let us know if we can be of more service to you! - Kiera A.

name: Fred Fletcher
text:
Christy Golden, Property Manager at U-Lock-It, genuinely wants to help people. I recently moved my step-daughter down and we were looking for a storage facility. There were some items that we were unsure about storing and Christy gave us her honest and professional opinion regarding the storage of the items, which saved us thousands of dollars; if we had stored them like we planned.  In addition, because of the move, are budget was a little over, so Christy took the time out of her schedule to give us some additional local numbers to check other prices; however, after calling around and comparing the prices,  U-Lock-it had the best prices. Most important, Christy’s customer service, her positive attitude and willingness to assist us on the day before the 4th of July showed that her Family Owned Company was the best for us.
When you’re moving you can be at a vulnerable stage and I have seen some companies take advantage of that; however, Christy at U-Lock-It demonstrated that she cared and treated me and  my step-daughter with nothing but the upmost respect. She actually treated us like family.
I whole-heartedly endorse U-Lock-It for any of your storage needs.
Excellent company
Fred

name: Owen Smith
text:
I went to SmithStoreit at the location off of Church Street to rent a 10 by 15 storage unit. The service I received was far superior than that of Uncle Bob's Self Storage, which I had used in the past. Jerry and Brent made me feel comfortable about the storage size I chose and did not try to oversell me on a size that would be too large.

In addition I once used "Downtown Storage" located in downtown Huntsville, AL which was more costly than SmithStoreit, and difficult to move my furniture in & out of due to limited amount of space once inside the building. Once I found out that Smithstoreit offered Climate Controlled units, I drove down there to check the place out. It didn't take long for me to be sold on choosing SmithStoreit over anywhere else. The place seemed exceptionally well kept up, clean, and very secure. I'll definitely be using them in the future when I need to move into a bigger apartment or house.

text: This storage was the only one with a big unit at the time I told the lady working there to call me as soon as one became available and she did called me the unit was very clean and in great condition, this storage building has cameras all around the building Wich is great, concrete in all the units and is in a great location I highly recommend it besides the lady there is very helpful and nice

text: Been renting for 6 years now, and no problems.

name: David
text:
*edit*

The lady who runs the place is extremely nice. She really is. But if you use this place, pay close attention to the water guard at your door. Our stuff has been there since April. It's now mid-July. About half of our stuff is covered in mold. My pillow that I've had my entire life... ruined by mold. Our brand new $4,000 couch and love seat covered in mold. All of our clothes, covered in mold. EVERYTHING covered in mold. Wish I had used Yates storage. I recommend people going to Yates Storage. I don't know about the service you recieve at Yates. But I know your stuff would stay dry, and not get ruined like our stuff did.

name: Mickey Burns
text: Renter beware!! Was not told at time of rental, but the they have price increases every 6 to 12 months, last one was 12% increase, that can get expensive over a long period of time, so just be prepared for that if you decide to rent here in case they fail to tell you that or it’s buried in the rental contract and you miss reading it.

resp.text:
Hello Mickey, we are sorry to hear about your experience while renting with us. While we do occassionally increase our rates, this is done to provide a better experience to our customers by way of improvements made to facilities and covering increases to maintenance costs. We always take great care when raising rates to ensure that they happen as infrequently as possible, and with impact as dictated by the market. Even with that, we always try to provide the smallest possible increase. If there is anything we can do to assist you further, please reach us at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Decatur - Deere Rd Team

name: Ali Franks
text: If this storage building wasn’t the only one near by I would have rented somewhere else. The manager is rude and yelled at my movers whenever they were dropping my belongings off at my unit. There were items left over from the last tenant that the manager said she was going to get out and never did. They also rented the unit I had reserved online without even calling me about it. They are expensive for what you get. Also be aware that the price of your unit is not a fixed rate like they tell you and it is subject to change (not disclosed whenever you start renting). They also tell you they prorate a month if you were moving out, what they don't tell you is that they only prorate if you are out by the 5th of the month.

resp.text: Hi Ali, the staff at iStorage Priceville take our reviews very seriously and we appreciate you taking the time to share your concerns with us. It is thanks to feedback like yours that we can tackle issues that may impact our most valuable asset; our customers. I have sent your comments to the management at iStorage Priceville for review. We look forward to serving you in the future. If there is anything more we can do to improve your experience please email us at info@istorage.com or give us a call toll-free at 844-311-2342. Best Regards, the iStorage Team.

name: April Ray
text: I don't think this was the facilities fault but my mover was in such a hurry to get my stuff into the storage that he just downloaded the app and put my information in for my unit. Then I went back and forth with a nice guy at your office and this whole 18 hours I've been trying to work on this and the app keeps crashing. I rebooted my phone a dozen times and uninstalled and reinstalled the app plenty and it was always the same issue. I'll try later on today. Now the theory of this place is so revolutionary. No key to keep up with no dealing with those U-Haul locks that are so tight you break your fingernails trying to get it off. As you can see I've used plenty of storage units before.

resp.text: April, we appreciate your review. Our facility does have some revolutionary technology for storage and we have worked out some minor issues. We apologize for any issues you may have had. Thanks for storing with us.

text: I have been using Extra Space Storage for about two years now. If you need a reliable storage space business, you must consider Extra Space. When I initially went there, I had no idea about what I needed like size and everything. They were there to "tour" and advise with no pressure to do business. Go by, you will be glad you did.

name: Alice Redding
text:
I received outstanding customer service from April Goodman.  Ms. Good assisted me with the correct amount of storage space for my items.  Ms. Goodman reassured me if the space wasn't large enough, I could upgrade my storage unit.  I was able to place my deposit over the phone the same day and move my items in immediately.  Ms. Goodman provided all the information and directions I needed to access the storage unit.

The storage unit was clean and located in a safe environment.  There was no contract on length or time to rent the storage unit nor a penalty when I decided to end renting the unit.

Thank you for your outstanding customer service.

resp.text: Wow, thanks for the excellent rating Alice! We’re so glad we were able to meet your storage needs.

text: You have always been great to work with. I really appreciate the call when my payment didn't go through on time. My card was hacked and shut off and I didn't catch everything that was automatic on it. Cable bill was same way and after 15 years of zero late payments they just automatically shut it off with no warning. You called and sent a text checking on it and will always have my business as long as I need a storage shed. Thank you.

name: Lilly P
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. SAFE SECURE LOCATION. Five Star customer service! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to cancel? Also, when I asked how she knew I moved out the night before, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback, Lilly. We know that your items are important to you, so we make it a priority to provide a safe and secure self-storage experience. It’s important to us that you feel appreciated as our customer; we are here to help at 888-STORAGE if anything comes up.

name: Christin French
text: AWESOME EXPERIENCE. FRIENDLY CUSTOMER SERVICE. I rarely take the time to write reviews but I had to share my experience! I had to put my things in storage for a bit, moving from one state to another. Basically my entire life was in that storage unit, and it’s hard to TRUST that all your things are going to be ok. Naturally I think of every worst case scenario, flooding, theft, mice. I chose this facility because it is gated, well lit, secure, and the website says the manager lives on site. I paid extra for the air-conditioned unit, and it was very easily accessible and easy to load my things into. When I moved my things out 2 weeks early… I got a phone call from Christy. Asking if I was permanently moved out… That thoroughly impressed me for a variety of reasons. A) they proactively reached out to me to ensure my stuff was OK & to make sure I was ok with turning auto-pay off. How many companies would just bill you for another month and hope you forgot to notify them? Also, when I asked how she knew if I moved out, they said they walk the grounds every morning and inspect every unit to make sure there wasn’t damage. If I ever need a storage unit again in the future, I will absolutely use this place. That gave me such a great feeling that my things are secure, and to know they’re inspecting every single unit every day. That’s awesome. You can definitely trust this place with your stuff!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words, Christin. We really appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. Extra Space Storage takes great pride in protecting your belongings and strives to provide state-of-the-art security, we're thrilled that your experience has reflected that. Stop by our office or give us a call at 888-STORAGE at any time if you need assistance or have any questions.

name: Kyle E
text: This morning I was looking for a place to store unnessisary items that I do not need or use at all. While I am a college student I wanted a place to store my items to make my appartment a happy livable space. Today I went to store 8477 and met a very lovely associate named April Goodman and while  I was there she treated me not only as a customer, but it welt like during the our time felt like family. When I asked to see the 5' by 7' we looked at the unit and it was not something i was looking for. However when she suggested a 5' by 15' we needed to walk to the very far building on the property to view the unit. Ms. April recommended the golf cart. I told her we did not need to use it since it is a beautiful day out and it would be a nice walk to get exercise. As walking down I told her I might not like the 15' size and asked about the 5' by 8' and that it was the last one available and that we needed to walk back to the main building to see it. As we were walking to the last building she asked if I still wanted to see the 15 footer and I asked her please. When we walked back to the 5 by 8 room I walked in it and i felt in love with the space that it had its own light and also own air vent. I told her it was sold and we went back to the office and did all the paper work and I am now renting a air controlled 5' by 8' and so far I love it. As I was loading my unit an hour ago I loaded a car load in the unit then walked to the office to ask a question. As I opened the door to the office I was looking into the office smiling and as I was walking in Ms. April's office phone rang and Ms. Lechelle in the desk right next to her asked me how can i help you. As I was walking in I did not notice Ms. Lechelle asking me that question. So as I continued walking into the office Ms. Lechelle rudely asked me how may I help you. I asked my question and left the office not happy with the tone she was talking to me in as a paying customer. I do not appresiate that at all. Next time I go to the office to get help I will only make sure that I only ask miss april for help no matter if there are 2 people in the office or if she is off I will only work with her. Overall I love the facility and I would gladly recommend it to my friends and family if they ever need any storage rooms. But because of the rude experience I will only rate this 4 stars!!!!!!!!!

resp.text: Hi Kyle, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We aim to provide the highest level of customer service and are thrilled to hear your experience with April reflects that! We're delighted to hear you are so happy with the storage unit you rented! Providing a positive experience for each of our customers is very important to us and we hope to better serve you next time you visit the office. Your recommendation means a lot to us. Thank you again for leaving us a review! Don't hesitate to give us a call at (256) 461-0235 or stop by our office if you need anything in the future!

name: Stacey Smith
text: Be careful using this storage facility. They advertise 24 hour camera monitoring but this is not the case. I was notified by the site manager Krystal on Jan 7 2020, asking why did I pay on a unit that was empty. I explained to her that I was at the unit on Dec 26 2019 storing additional items and paid the rent on Jan 2 2020. On the Jan 7th, I went to the unit and sure enough it was empty with no trace of my items in sight. The unit was clean and ready for someone to move in. My lock was missing and had been replaced with a blue lock by the storage facility's site manager. The police were contacted and after the investigation there was footage of me taking items on Dec 26th 2019 but no footage of my items being taken on or before Jan 7 2020. The items taken included a large 60 inch tv (older style), deep freezer and gas grill to name a few. These are heavy items that would take some time to remove and load up from a climate controlled unit in which you must enter a door to gain access to the unit. I am highly disappointed in how the site manager and owner Karmen treated me during the process. I had to request for the rent to be refunded for Jan 2020 and I received no apologies or follow-ups from either of them after the incident. Store at Your Own Risk!!

resp.text: We strongly apologize for any inconvenience. For more security, we will be adding more Cameras to ensure greater assistance for our tenants and property. Anything we can do to further help your situation please let us know.

text: Great

name: David Warren
text: There is a muscular guy with a light beard. Dude, you don't belong there. Crawl back into your mommy's basement. Stay there, don't ever come out. This world is better off without you.

name: David Allain
text:
Started my journey with renting a UHAUL truck and trailer two weeks before the move. Megan was very knowledgeable and helped me make the right truck size choice. Unfortunately, the uhaul reservation system was down that day so I reserved from home later that week.

For some reason the “traffic” division of UHAUL that is not based in Auburn changed my reservation the day before and I was going to have to go to Phoenix City to pick up a truck, and Opelika to pick up the trailer. Ended up working with Hunter King and Hugh three times in one day, the day before the rental pickup date, to iron out my issues.

Hunter gave the info for traffic try and get it sorted out, which eventually did work. There wasn’t anything he could do to add my reservation to the store because they were out of truck. By an act of God someone canceled later and I got the truck I needed at this location. Then “traffic” moved it again..

Needless to say. Hunter K. was knowledgeable, patient, and extremely helpful in getting the reservation squared away again and even helped add an extra day to my reservation so I could get the truck immediately.

11/10 recommend this store because of the employees Megan, Hunter K., and Hugh.

I say everything here to show you how much of a hassle it can be to reserve online. If you can reserve in-person at this store it will save SOOO many headaches.

War Damn Eagle

name: Tuyen_2000
text: Paperwork got messed up and I got charged for 460 miles instead of the 30 I did. Seem to think it's perfectly fine to do 460 miles in six hours and refuse to refund the couple hundred dollars they overcharged. Just rent a truck, don't come here.

name: joy G
text:
Best service Ever. Megan is the best
She is so friendly and helpful
I would like to give more than 5 stars
Box Truck rental was efficient and well run.
Fast and efficient. Customer service courteous and professional.
Highly recommended

name: Amber K
text: They are the absolute worst! I've never met a set of ruder people in my life. If you can't go to another uhaul location just pick Budget or Penske and save yourself the headache.

name: Jerry F
text: Megan is the best.  Never expected such friendly and incredible service when I needed help moving my son in to college.  Thank you so much for your help Megan.  You made my day and my week easier.  Highly recommend.

text: Super friendly and helpful staff. I had to go into the store multiple times and interacted with several different people. They were all courteous.

name: Mohammadnaser Ansari
text: I had some issues with the truck and the roadside assistance was completely useless. They did not have any service available in Auburn at the time (near downtown). However, the lady in charge of the store was exceptionally helpful (didn't get the name). The only reason I will rent again is only for the great customer service in the store.

name: Pierce M
text: Hunter is a great employee. Super helpful and a good communicator which made renting / returning a breeze.

name: N Stovah
text: Hunter was excellent. Very friendly and knowledgeable. Deserves a big raise.

name: Leonard Sloan
text: Quick fast and easy service

name: Laurie Hillanbrand
text: A No Show. We made a reservation for a Move In date for a Saturday. The woman who took the information said they are no longer open on a Saturday, but she would make the exception for this time. She gave us her personal cell phone number and asked if we would call 15 minutes before arrival and she would meet us to sign the paper work. We did just that, no one picked up, but we left a message. We arrived with a dorm room full of stuff to store for the summer and we called again, no answer. The sign on the door of the office said they were closed but to call the number (her number)AND the national number, which is what we did. The Representative for the national number said the U-HAUL company doesn't allow their storage buildings to close on a Saturday and that they couldn't do more to help us. So while we waited for a return phone call, we started looking at other storage places near by and STOR-EAGLE Storage was able to accommodate us with no problems! At the time of this review it has been almost 5 hours since we left a message at U-HAUL Moving & Storage of Auburn and we still did not get a return phone call. Make a reservation at your own risk.

name: Rachel Sugg
text:
My husband and I chose to use Uhaul for our move because it was the best affordable option. For future moves we will do everything we can to avoid working with them again.

After making a reservation a month in advance, we found that our truck had been double booked and watched it be given to someone else right in front of us. When asked for some kind of alternative or assistance, the man who was supposed to be helping us simply told us, “That’s too bad,” and that we could call the national Uhaul line. Because our state is becoming overwhelmed with COVID-19 cases, we used the Uhaul app to check in and pick up the truck. However, the man helping us said that we should have come inside (where not a single employee was masked) if we wanted the truck. We understand that this situation may not have been this individual’s fault, but his behavior made our situation even more distressing, as he was quite rude, even belligerent, and made no attempt at an apology for this very disruptive mistake.

This mixup has made our lives very difficult, and we were sorely disappointed in the employee’s attitude toward us. In the future, we will not be using Uhaul, and from now on we will be warning others about this.

name: Chelsea Clayton
text: I have rented uhaul trailers before but I have never had an experience like this one! The employees absolutely knocked my socks off!! Brandon, Megan, and Blake have absolutely made this experience the best I have ever had.  I will definitely come back to this location for all my rental needs!!

name: Space Cadet
text: Great service and very friendly. Have dropped off Uhauls twice here in the past month.

name: Corey Harris
text:
We waited in the store for 10 mins until
Someone walked in from the back to help. We did the scan and go on the app, and the man still wanted to verify our items and print a confirmation. Why do scan and go if you have to wait in line anyways?

name: Gopal Nath
text: I reserved 15’ truck.  Before  picking up they assigned me 26’  truck instead,  saying that 15’ not available.

name: Zongru Han
text: Worst service ever, staff is rude and they wouldn’t talk to you for more than 10min

name: Jose Torres
text: Uhaul's online booking system made some major errors on my booking, but I had a ton of time-saving help from the staff at this location. They helped me get the correct size truck for my move.

name: Cal Warriner
text: Could not have been better. Guy behind counter was quick and efficient. Guy who hooked trailer up just as good. In and out in 20 minutes including purchase of wardrobes, tape, boxes and part for hitch.

name: William Paris
text: Megan was very helpful and the store had everything I needed. Thank you. I wasn't expecting such a pleasant experience.

name: James S
text: Unable to complete reservation because "keys were lost by last person to use the van." First, there should be duplicates. Second, I was called the morning I was supposed to move. Why even bother guaranteeing something that is not there? After cancelling my reservation and having me go around town looking for a same-day, 3x more rental, the location did not even tell me about the U-Haul program that gives partial reimbursements for failed guarantees.

name: Paramjit “Perry” Kahai, PhD
text:
The rep who assisted me at this store is a tall, bearded man.  As soon as he handed me the truck, I took a picture of the odometer. On the contract, he had mileage out that was lower than what I saw before I started moving. The mileage out should be the odometer mileage when the truck is handed to the customer, not the mileage that may be on their records when the truck was returned by a previous customer.

Also, unknown to me, there was a dolly in the back that I had not even reserved.  I saw it only when I opened the back to load my stuff.  I was surprised, to say the least and wondered if I will be billed for it. Guess what?  I was billed for it even though I had not used it. And how did he know that I had used it? When I called this morning, he told me that the plastic tab that was attached to the dolly was broken. When I try to assure him that I had not even touched the dolly, his response was rude and something like "we have a lot of customers who say they didn't use the dolly but they actually did." In short, he had just accused me of lying!  My question is: why was the dolly even there in the first place? I had not reserved it!  And if there was something in the back of the truck, he should have opened the back and shown it to me.  I would have asked for the dolly to be taken out. Further, how do I know that tab wasn't broken before the truck keys were handed to me? So, this was a clear case of an attempt to cheat a customer.  I wonder how many people this store rep has cheated.  Next time, if I ever rent again from this location (which I very much doubt) or any other, I will make certain to open the back and have them remove any extra stuff I did not order!

Any attempts at talking with the rep over the phone was met with rude, curt, and insulting responses.  The phone call was recorded by the location, so that will provide evidence of whether I am telling the truth about the rep's attitude and lack of respect towards me.

BE CAREFUL WHEN YOU RENT A TRUCK AT THIS LOCATION. INSPECT EVERYTHING BEFORE YOU LEAVE AND HAVE THEM REMOVE EVERYTHING YOU HAD NOT RESERVED.

name: Shari Belton
text: The General Manager greets you at the door. I had a reservation to pick up a trailer for my son and later found out it wasn't needed. The store was able to refund my money within two days, even though I purchased a one-way rental. Be sure to stop by there for all of your rental needs!

name: John Parker
text: Without a doubt, the most unprofessional outfit of workers I've ever witnessed behind a single desk. My sister went into the store to complete the very routine process of accessing her storage unit. However, unbeknownst to her or anyone else, they were full and instead rerouted her reservation to Georgia. This information was not even gathered until they second attempt to receive help from the desk, for the first time we spoke to their general manager, Tavon Scott, who was at the moment in no mood to do his job. As soon as he saw that our last name did not come up in the computer, he looked at us as if we were crazy and then proceeded to profusely rid himself of all blame ("it was the call center") and yelled at us for becoming frustrated at the fact that we seemingly had no storage. He was completely unwilling to make up for the fault of his company in any capacity and did nothing but sit there and act annoyed at our frustration. I dropped by one last time to use the restroom and I could hear them quoting us and laughing at our situation until they saw I had come in. I was so disgusted at their attitude about their job that I marched up to the desk to get Mr. Scott's full name to write in this report, to which he replied, laughing "You can just look up my name if you need it." I replied "take care" and he replied "oh I will take care" and continued to murmur something under his breath to the amusement of his coworkers. I've never held an official job to this date, but if I talked half as rudely to any customer as they did to us, I'd expect to be canned on the spot, and that's exactly what I wish upon this man, Mr. Scott. I'd equate this crew to a group of shiftless, gawky teenagers who are too immature to own up to their own shortcomings. Simply put, these insolent fools don't know how to represent a company and don't appreciate the name stitched onto their shirt. They've made a decision to be bad at what they do. One star for knowing English.

name: Mark Gallagher
text: My reserved trailer was rented to another person which sent it over 90 miles away.   However, since we all remained calm; they worked with us and gave us a 17 foot truck which worked out so much better than a small trailer.  It had better gas milage, great air conditioning, and we didn't need to pay extra for a logistical error.  Thanks guys at Auburn U-Haul for making my move stress free and helping out even though you really didn't need to....

name: Christopher Abreu
text: I had reserved a truck a month in advance, only to have it redirected from this location to another 45 minutes away the day before my move. They claim they were “overbooked”, even though they confirmed the reservation to me over the phone earlier in the week, and was not updated online until after the email. Calling the office takes you to their call center, where you either get someone that is willing to help or someone that hangs up on you. I would not recommend bringing your business here, as the overall experience was unprofessional, sloppy, and infuriating.

name: Whitney Mullins
text: I reserved a self-storage climate control unit with U-Haul on February 1st. I kept the email confirmation and went by to make sure everything was in order so my roommate could begin moving their stuff into storage. After twenty minutes of waiting in line I showed them the email and asked how to go about getting access to the unit since I had never done this before. The man looked up everything and said I was nowhere in the system. I showed him the confirmation and everything that was needed and he said he was sorry, but there was nothing he could do. The manager came out and said that they have not had the climate control storage for over two months now. I told him I have had the unit reserved since February and received no notice that anything was changed. I even called two days ago checking to make sure and the lady said everything was fine. I asked them if they could help me out because I had to find somewhere to put the items because I have to be moved out by noon tomorrow and cannot move into my new place until August 15. They said they could not help me and turned me away. I will never use the company of U-Haul again. There was only one storage unit available in the city of Auburn, and it was at Uncle Bob's storage. The only reason they had it available was because someone cancelled an hour before I called. Thank goodness for that.

name: Randy Mauldin
text:
I rented a 26' truck today. You double billed my credit card. I should have known that you were a disreputable business when Michael asked me for my credit card without quoting me a price. Since you are a monopoly I guess you think that people will pay any amount of money to rent a truck.
He then quoted me a price which I agreed to. I found out when I picked up the truck that he conveniently failed to tell me that there is a hidden fee of $0.99 a mile. WOW, now you have added $80 in hidden fees.
I started to cancel the reservation but then I remembered that you are the only place that rents moving equipment. I had to move so I was stuck with the extortion.
Since you are greedy bastards, you decide to go ahead and stick it to me. You double billed my credit card to make up for the frustration of dealing with an unhappy customer.

They also told me that it would take an hour, but the service rep on phone said 4 hours and would be $210.00 plus parts and wire.   Called CTU(CUSTOM TRUCKS UNLIMITED) RIGHT up the street and they install for $125.00 parts and all.  Never ever using these morons again. text: This was one of my last resorts as a storage facility that had an open unit near my location. Thankfully phillys cleaned it out while I was there to make sure I was able to get a unit. She has exceeded any customer service experience I have ever had ANYWHERE. After unloading a truck myself for about 4-5 hours, when she got off work, she even left and brought me a sandwich. It was so touching to think there are still good people out there who are only doing something out of the kindness of their own heart. It was such a small gesture, but she’s continued to always go above and beyond. She’s even answered the phone when I’ve called knowing the business was already closed. No one ANYWHERE these days would pick up a phone even a minute after closing. I just wanted to share my experiences with her and Nikki. They are absolutely wonderful, they are the glue that holds it all together. I’ll be leaving a similar review on Facebook, and emailing corporate- so these fine ladies get the recognition they didn’t seek, but very clearly deserve! You girls are amazing!

name: Nathalie Valley
text: Phyllis and the staff at Handy Lock Self Storage on Grelot Road in Mobile, Alabama are great! Phyllis is very friendly and helpful. She always puts a humorous spin on things and makes me feel like I am her best customer. This is the second time I have rented a storage unit from Phyllis and each time I have had a positive experience. The facility itself is always neat and clean. I love the added convenience of having the small dumpster in the back of the lot.

resp.text: Nathalie - Phyllis and Luke set the "Gold Standard" for Self Storage Managers, and we are fortunate to have them.  Thank you for storing with us, and we will continue to earn your praise.

name: SJ L
text: I have rented space at this Handy Lock location for years, and I have been completely pleased with my experience.  Property manager Phyllis Lucas lives on site, and she runs the business like a well-oiled machine.  Phyllis knows her customers, she knows her business, and she goes above and beyond to make your rental experience go smoothly.   In addition to having a property manager who is great at her job, there are other important considerations.  All storage units are (1) inside units, (2) climate controlled, and (3) ground-level.  There are many security measures in place.  In addition to your lock(s) on your unit, the building entrances by which one accesses the units are locked, and, in turn, the buildings themselves are behind a gated fence which requires entry of a code to open.  There are security cameras all over the property, with the video feeds monitored in the office.  Phyllis and her husband live on-site, and they take a great deal of pride in maintaining the buildings, the landscaping, and the tenant restroom.  Phyllis and her husband love people, and they love their work, and it shows.  I highly recommend Handy Lock on Grelot Road.  If you need storage space in west Mobile, call Phyllis Lucas.

name: Tanny Le Master
text: Great place to storage, they are very clean and spotless.

resp.text:
Thank you for the review!  We work very hard to keep the property clean!

Handy Lock Self Storage

name: Jade Davis
text: I have had storage units at Handy Lock for 6 years now. The management is phenomenal - Phyllis is helpful, attentive, and friendly. After a particularly bad flood, I received a call first thing the morning after the rain finally stopped - they had a team on site to help clean out units and provided new boxes to replace Any damaged by the water (and the company has since worked on the drainage to help prevent further flooding-though that particular storm was so bad, their drainage issue was not to blame.) any time I've had questions or needed information, I received quick answers. Phyllis treats everyone like family and I couldn't imagine storing my things anywhere else.

resp.text: Jade - Thank you for your kind comments and your continued patronage.  We have aggressively worked with the City and our surrounding property owners to prevent any problems in the future.  We have also taken steps to fortify our property in the case of another catastrophic event.

name: Ken Coale
text:
This is a great place to store your stuff. The place is located on Hwy. 59 South, just south of Foley on your way to Gulf Shores. What I liked most was the friendly, courteous, and professional service from the manager, Coach Larry Keyes. He was very attentive to our needs and got us in a unit that was just right for what we wanted in a climate controlled storage unit. Coach was very professional in his dealings with us and completely explained how everything worked from the hours to the helpful hints on getting the proper size for our "stuff." I also liked  how clean the entire place was and the rolling carts were a lifesaver in getting the heavy boxes we had to put in our unit. We are very pleased with our choice to move from the "other" place down the road, just North of where we are now. Additionally, Uncle Bob's has a pretty neat and simple web site you can use to help you remember little things like, when your payment is due. Doesn't hurt to have a little reminder occasionally, you know. Oh, and the Coach is a big time football fan, too. When I'm not so busy, I'll go by and check on him and his team........Thanks.
Ken Coale

They took it upon themselves to change it to a 15-footer with NO approval from me NOR did they contact me to inform me they had done so. I found out day of rental they had given my reserved truck to someone else! The U Haul company told me when I called that they had made the change at their location.

(Luckily Frank’s Place Neighborhood U-Haul had one or I would have been in a huge last-minute mess with my contracted storage facility and arranged helpers.)

I explained the situation and she called the police.  I explained that he's a service dog, showed her the Service dog ID and dog tag,  and she said she didn't care.  Took photos of my license plate and everything.  I am now waiting for the police to arrive, because I didn't do anything wrong.  Nice people...

name: Glenn Riggs
text: Blackbox self storage is an amazing facility. Great management, works with you to take care of your needs. Renting and move in are simple because Jesse does whatever it takes to accommodate your move in or out. The facility is clean and well lit. The security both video and individually alarmed units allow you peace of mind.  24 hour access as well as many great occupants make it an awesome experience. It’s the only storage I’ve ever used that has a light switch rather than a timer, also has an outlet in the unit and access to water nearby. I just can’t say enough about this business. They treat you as friends and help in any way possible. I’ll certainly use them again if needed and tell everyone about them. Thanks so much Jesse.

name: Lauren Hardison
text: We rented a climate controlled unit for right at a year after we sold our house. The owner is super friendly, but the security and cleanliness is what won me over!! The automatic security that each unit has with the main gait relieved my fears of anyone breaking into our unit. It’s very well lit, so anytime I needed to go in the evenings I had absolutely no worries! Would certainly recommend this for all your storage needs!!

name: Mark Clemens
text: I was very pleased with my experience. The management was very nice, respectful, communicated well and was willing to work with me when the moving van showed up. The facility is kept in excellent condition. The security is also excellent including daily checks of each unit by the management. Automated billing is offered and works well. A worry free experience. You can tell a lot about a place during the move-in and move-out processes. This place is the best. I also learned that the humidity in the Madison Alabama area is not good for cardboard boxes. Stacked cardboard boxes began to fail over time. I do recommend the tough storage tote bins from Home Depot. They hold up well and can be stacked to the ceiling. You can seal the tote bins with Ty-wraps and large moving companies will take them without an issue. The plastic tote bins also do well if it decides to rain on moving day like it did on mine. Of course, I always recommend being a good steward of the rental space keeping it clean and reporting any issues (none for me). Although not required, I always set aside a broom and dust pan and sweep out the unit to leave it as I found it or better. Mark

resp.text: We love hearing your feedback and are thrilled to know you are enjoying your experience with us, Mark! Give us a call at (256) 837-1050 if you need any future assistance. Our team is happy to help with any of your storage needs!

name: Ted Rosseter
text:
I found this storage company while looking for a place to park my RV. I found that place just up the road and was leaving there when I noticed The Storage Neighbor lot. Since I was also looking for a place to store some things, I stopped and went in. It turned out to be one of the smarter things I have done recently!

Stephanie was on the phone helping a customer with what appeared to be a difficult situation and it took her a while to straighten things out. But that didn't bother me. I knew that if I ever had a problem, she would help me solve it. And that realization gave me a warm fuzzy feeling about having stopped there!

My unit is in a new building, bright and clean, with a smooth running, sturdy door and will be a pleasure to work with - unlike some other storage lockers I have had.

Stephanie is a hoot to work with and I have already started a list of "excuses" to stop by the office. Thank you Stephanie!

name: Jason Lee
text: From start to finish, a personalized, great experience.  After submitting an online inquiry, I was promptly called back about making sure I had the right unit for me.  Also, they had some nice deals going on for several units at the time, which I was able to utilize.  I had to move in rather quickly, and had a buddy with a truck load of my stuff waiting outside, and the entire process of setting up the unit and the contract was a breeze.  Just a few minutes and I was taken to my unit to make sure it was A-OK.  One final note: the security doors WORK properly, which is a huge breath of fresh air compared to the last two storage facilities I used (entering keycodes to no results, or gates left wide open even).  Pleasant folks to deal with, really seemed to care about my situation and my need to get in quickly, and the service has been excellent ever since.

text: This place is 1st class! It is clean and the employees are professional. I arrived late in the day and it was raining but that didn’t matter to David. He got me all set up and showed me to my storage location. Very professional and courteous. I highly recommend them!

text: I recently contacted Southeast Storage in Wetumpka and it truly was a wonderful experience.  I was limited on time and apologized up front and was treated with the upmost professionalism and accommodations. I left there feeling great about the experience.  I truly highly recommend them!

name: Sherry Riley
text: Friendly staff. Great seevice. I’ve used both climate controlled and regular storage and rented uhaul and never had any issues

name: Michael Howerton
text:
David is the best! Great customer service!
Me and my family were traveling home from the beach back to Atlanta when our truck broke down .
The truck was fully loaded down with the golf cart in the bed and a 32ft offshore boat attached to the back .
I told the guy who worked there ( David) that I needed a place to park everything while I came up with a plan to handle this situation. He was more than willing to allow secure parking behind the security gates .
After contacting a wrecker service and a mobile deisel mechanic I decided to attempt the repairs myself. David and I  were able to remove the top half of my engine and replace a wiring harness under the valve cover and I was back on the road within a couple of hours.
Although I have never rented a unit from this location , I can tell from the excellent customer service and extremely clean and secure facility that this is the best place to store anything! The place has strong automatic gates , camers , indoor climate control , and  large parking areas for very large campers and boats.
Thanks again David! Wish you the best !

name: Tony Weeks
text: Horrible experience, would rate lower but not able. Paid for a storage that was 8-10 inches shorter than advertised. Then upgraded to a larger storage only to find that the property was not properly leveled, so they made up the difference in about 6-8 inches of concrete. The additional height of the concrete pad along with the raised flooring placed for drainage created the unit non-usable for trailers. After finding all this out I was refused a refund or even an alternative solution. Was then ghosted for a few weeks only to get a call stating basically not their problem.

resp.text:
Hello Tony, we are sorry to hear that you had a poor experience while renting with us. We always strive to provide our customers with a smooth and hassle free storage experience, and from your account this was not the case. If there is anything further you would like to let us know, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

name: Rebecca Pullen
text: FEES FEES FEES! Don't be fooled by their low prices online. They charge $15 for insurance and even if you show them your declaration page from your homeowners insurance they will say your insurance doesn't cover everything. This is true, for a storage unit AND your house. But it is still sufficient. Then they say something else, then something else.... And demand you pay their monthly fee. We cancelled and went to a properly run storage unit.

resp.text:
Hello Rebecca, we are sorry to hear that you had a poor experience while renting with us. Our goal is to provide our customers with the best storage experience possible -- this includes preventing your insurance premiums from going up by using your homeowners policy. When possible, we recommend using the protection plan we offer, as it kicks in before a homeowner policy, and does not cause your premiums to increase. If there is anything more we could do, please let us know at feedback@istorage.com.

Sincerely,
The iStorage Team

name: Jason Nicklaus
text: My family recently rented a unit here and honestly in my experience most all storage units are about the same. Our deciding factor to rent here was the service we received by Debbie along with appearance and cleanliness of the property. She took the time to show us the unit and ask questions to make sure the space we looked at would be the correct size for our needs. That may seem like a given but other places in the area made it seem like a chore to show us the rental space if they showed it at all. Debbie also took the time to make certain we had the packing materials we needed and made suggestions on packing materials we were not aware of. Debbie also did a great job at explaining the lease and the services we were paying for. This place while similar wasn't the cheapest we inquired about but the service provided by Debbie along with the cleanliness of the property by far made this the best value in the area in my opinion.

resp.text: Thanks, Jason Nicklaus, for leaving us a five-star review! It's great to hear that we were all you expected and more. We select, train and coach our team around the idea that customers deserve memorable and positive experiences. As such, we are delighted to read how our staff delivered above and beyond your expectations. We sincerely look forward to serving you time after time. Looking forward to your next visit, your friends at iStorage.

name: Zach J
text:
I stored some furniture and appliances in a 10' x 10' outdoor storage unit here from April 2018 through November 2018 while searching for a house. I had a great experience with the staff and facility, and I will recommend them to anyone I know looking for storage.

Moving in was a breeze. Entering and exiting the facility through the secure gate is easy peasy, and there's tons of room to maneuver a large truck to unload your stuff straight into your storage unit.

All of my things were in great shape when I moved out. My storage unit was clean and in proper order when I moved in and moved out. I didn't have any issues with pests or vermin taking residence in my stuff or the storage unit.

The staff are incredibly friendly, fastidious, and accomodating. If you have any questions, they'll give you a straight answer, and they're really on top of their game when it comes to keeping the place in tip top shape.

Long story short: this is a great place to keep your stuff.

resp.text:
Hey Zach, we are very happy to hear that you had a great experience when renting with us. This is exactly what we expect when customers walk through our doors, and it is very reassuring to hear what we are doing right. If there is anything we could have done to give you a better experience, please reach out to us at feedback@istorage.com.

I recommend Life Storage to anyone looking for a friendly well educated staff. Sonya was my initial first contact but I've been back since then and there are 2 other female employees there that are just as awesome and friendly. text: I needed a storage space for my overflow of household items like curtains, blankets, lamps, etc. so i searched around for some storage space, and found uncle bob's to be reasonable, or so i thought. I went online to get all of the information before going to the storage company . when i got there that's when i was told about the MANDAORY insurance, which was never mentioned online. The insurance needless to say increased the price of the storage unit. Other than the mandatory insurance, the experience, the storage space, and the personnel working with me made the experience of renting the space was a nice one. But i must say just know that you MUST purchase the insurance to rent a storage unit, which will increase your monthly storage fee.

text: I needed a storage space for my overflow of household items like curtains, blankets, lamps, etc. so i searched around for some storage space, and found uncle bob's to be reasonable, or so i thought. I went online to get all of the information before going to the storage company . when i got there that's when i was told about the MANDAORY insurance, which was never mentioned online. The insurance needless to say increased the price of the storage unit. Other than the mandatory insurance, the experience, the storage space, and the personnel working with me made the experience of renting the space was a nice one. But i must say just know that you MUST purchase the insurance to rent a storage unit, which will increase your monthly storage fee.

text: I'll give them a 1 because they at least offer free truck rental BUT I had to first come to this location because the location where i PURCHASED my storage from didn't have a truck available. I was due to arrive at 5pm which i did after living the urgent care might i add. Upon arriving there wss a sign at the door stating be back at 5pm.  So after standing outside waiting a car arrive i followed it into the lot at now 5:18 once i got inside i saw the employee she then advised me to come through the from entrance so i walked back out the gate wait for her to open the door now its 5:20. Ok after doing so she asked for my info only for me to find out the person who previously rented the truck has not return and was due back at 4pm. Im thinking i should have got a call at 4:30 or some!! Anyway That person never answered for them and 6pm is approaching and that's closing time. So at 6pm i decide to leave. Although the employee was very apologetic I've still wasted gas driving from another city. No type of compensation was offered for my time and travel. Smh i was to sick to Even fuss. All I was offered was to contact the other location tomorrow at 12pm to see if the manager can get one smh!! Don't get me wrong now the ladies were very nice but i just think i could have been offered some i mean i had to already find movers, be off to move, and i need to be out of my apt and have it clean already smh so im stuff with a empty storage and all my furniture is waiting in living room!! 😢
