text: The kiosk was not working to take payment and the person on the phone was clueless.

name: William C. Hardy
text: Thing were good until my unit was robbed. Company doesn't care. Would not let me view the video. No local person to talk to only. Gates have been a huge problem for 2 months. The automatic gate has not been fixed and the pad lock gate is either open for weeks or closed with chain and combo lock that is never secured. THE ENTIRE NEIGHBORHOOD KNOWS THE CODE TO THE COMBO LOCK. So you will be robbed. They don't try to catch the thieves. Let's just say it will be an INSIDE JOB!!

name: M WS
text: DO Not Rent a unit here.  RED DOT took the storage units over while it was a secure facility.  The gate broke within a month and 5 months later, it still has not been repaired.  I called each month and sent emails through the company website.  Each rep told me something different but always, "it will be fixed soon".  I never received any response from the emails.  I was finally told on my last call that there is not an ETA on having the gate fixed nor does it really matter as that in their rental agreement they do not have to provide one.  There is not a level of management to talk to as calls are not escalated, there is not a local rep at all, you only have the call center rep and there is nothing, absolutely nothing they can do.  Which is a horrible customer service model.  The only thing they do quickly is put a lock on your unit for late pay, as in 5 days late and it may be 2 or 3 days before someone can come unlock it.

name: J B
text: If I could give less than 1 star, I would. Extremely poor management, absolutely will not call you back. The gate has been broken for quite some time and now it’s been broken into- please see the pictures I posted. Horrible managment. Run for your life.

name: Michael Gosnell
text: There is no onsite personnel at this facility.   Due to location, it can get sketchy after dark.

name: Meg K
text: Been there.....done that

resp.text: Hi there, Meg. We would love to hear more about your experience so that we can continue to improve. If you have specific frustrations, please contact our customer service team! Thank you!

name: Sean Feely
text: Location and ease of access

name: Leigh Baker
text:
HORRIBLE experience!!!!!
My unit was broken into and several boxes and a TV were stolen!
On top of that, someone else's box of belongings was in my unit!!!
So, obviously, someone else had been broken into and the thief left what they didn't want from them in my unit!!!!!

There was no one in the office for me to turn that box in to so that the owner of the box could look for it!
There was no one to personally help me! No one local!
The person I talked to on the phone was in another State!!!

No cameras because "someone" turned them away from where they were supposed to be watching! Red Dot had NO IDEA that the cameras were turned because they did not have anyone checking them on a daily basis!
I personally turned the cameras back to how they should have been, but every time I returned, the cameras were moved again!!!

I am SO disappointed and sad at the loss of my personal and very sentimental items!!!! You have to have a code to get into the place!!!!! My belongings should have been safe and protected! That's what I paid for!!!!

name: Brandon Flynn
text: Very accomodative. Love this company and facilities. Thank You Red Dot.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Brandon, the Red Dot Storage team appreciates the kind words!

name: Keandra Lee
text:
Very very disappointed and dissatisfied. My storage constantly broken into. I walked in today to see my belongings on the top of my storage. Will be moving from here ASAP!

I DO NOT RECOMMEND MOVING YOUR BELONGINGS HERE!!!!

name: David Huneycutt
text:
Not very secure. Beware.
Edit...
Guys it wasn't so much the fact that the unit was broken into, (that was bad enough) but I had to move your security cameras 4 times after our break-in. It would be moved to not show the entrance every time. I called at least 5 times and nothing was done, I would just keep moving the camera back. Then, one day I saw a Reddot truck there and stopped him and told him the story. He promised he would contact the site manager. I never got a call. Your call center is in the Philippines. Need I say more?

resp.text: Hi David. We apologize that you have experienced a break-in. We take facility security very seriously and are always working to ensure something like this does not occur. Since you were affected by the break-in, please call us at (855) 733-3681 and choose option #5 to speak with our Coverage Specialist.

name: S Morris
text: Great rates and convenient but they need to replace the burned out lights in the facility.  It was so dark, I could not see my lock.

name: Brian Bradford
text: Ceiling lights out everywhere, was told our responsibility to change red dots light bulbs. Bathroom isn't usable at all. Ac doesn't work

resp.text: Hi Brian. We're really sorry. The bathroom onsite will never be available for customer use, as we are unable to provide constant upkeep, as is needed with public restrooms. We have made some staffing adjustments and are going to fix this! We appreciate your patience.

name: Jordan Downing
text: I paid extra for a climate controlled storage unit after moving from another state. I have called and complained TWICE because it is hotter in the storage unit than it is outside. It has been 95°+ outside and no one seems to care. I have spent thousands of dollars on my belongings in the unit and I would not have paid EXTRA for a climate controlled unit just for my belongings to get ruined due to the lack of care from the employees at Red Dot. Worst experience I have ever had with a storage facility.

name: Tonia Mathews
text: Great climate control units very safe good prices

resp.text: Thank you for the review Tonia, the Red Dot Storage team appreciates the kind words!

name: Katherine Church
text: I located this company online.  The representative I spoke did not tell me about a move-in special.  I found out about the special the first time I visited my unit from a banner hanging at the entrance.  When I called the company to inquire about the move-in special they did not want to offer it to me because I did not mention the special when I signed the rental contract.  The company did come back later and offer me the special.  I am very pleased with the facility.  It is very clean and I feel secure while I am there.

name: Clinton Cordle
text: Not very secure

name: Ashley Bivins
text: I have a unit with Red Dot by default once they acquired my old storage facility Eastdale Self Storage. I must admit I'm truly sad to see the old people leave not just for their friendliness and helpfulness but ever since the acquisition, my price has been steadily going up month after month with no new added benefits or explanation and I can't wait to get my things away from there. I'm honestly only doing this review to hopefully receive a $5 credit towards my bill this month until I leave but my thoughts are true and honest sadly. I hope others may be able to find a better experience than I have based off of this review. Unit #49.

name: Joe Smith
text: I want to give this zero stars. By far this is the most mismanaged/rude owner I’ve ever met with in my life. Went to remove my belongings after only 2 months of storage to find everything covered in large rodent feces, important legal documents shredded, and clothing bags torn apart. I approached the owner with a calm manner to discuss options. He’s immediately confrontational and outright rude. His suggestion to me, was it wasn’t bad and I should just pressure wash my couches and children’s mattresses. Offered no form of apology whatsoever. By far the most unprofessional person I’ve ever came across that owns their own business. I would HIGHLY suggest looking elsewhere for your storage needs

name: Keslie Vinson
text: We were very satisfied with this company and their services until it came time to schedule delivery of our pod. We moved out of state and weren't sure what zip code we would end up in. When we called to schedule delivery and give them our new address, they decided to charge us an extra $600 to drive past our new address and turn around and come back to us. We have our stuff being stored in Birmingham, Al and want it delivered to Guntersville, Al and they want to take it to Huntsville, Al first and charge us for it  waited on hold for 30+min to get a supervisor on the phone and the best they would do is take 10% off the $600 over charge fee. Poor way to do business and considering how much was already paid for this service, its ridiculous. We will never use this company again unless they do something to make it right

resp.text: We’re disappointed to see this, Keslie. We encourage you to send us an email at socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID and additional details so we may best assist.

text: Came very promptly. Was professional and efficient.

resp.text:
We appreciate you taking the time to spread the word about your satisfaction with the level of service PODS provided.
Thank you, Essalyn!

text: I had a wonderful experience with the delivery of the empty pods and the pick up of my full pods. The employee who delivered was Brad S. He was so helpful, friendly, kind and professiona . He made my day, that I was very stressed about, stess free and even pleasant!!! THANK YOU BRAD⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

name: sara shipley
text: If I could give this company negative stars I would. They try to steal your money, they promise they can send your pod to its final destination on time and say no problem and then they tell you they can't so the pod is in the way for the new owners of the home you sold and it's in your way while you have to try and figure out how to move your things. Most unhelpful customer service ever. I have never been treated that way in my life, and I work in customer service. Refuse to even pick up their empty pod so you can use another means of moving.

resp.text: We can imagine this has been a stressful experience, and we’d like the chance to look into this, Sara. We encourage you to send us an email at socialmedia@pods.com with your customer ID and additional details so we may best assist.

name: p Carson
text:
Until today I would have given 5 stars but ...I recieved a message my unit was broken into .Arrived to find my unit locked with a new lock,
NO_ ONE here and not able to reach anyone by phone . Standing around for the last 2 1/2 hrs seen
Nobody cant access my unit to see what's missing , lost time from work !!!!!!!!! HORRIBLE CARE FOR YOURE CUSTOMERS !!!!!!
Going to cost me another day off work to deal with this. Unbelievable
Yep definitely a negative stars now
Talk about BAD business.
Trust me go somewhere else !!!!!!!!!!!!

Update here's to another hour wasted no return phone call
No body here .......

name: Julie Francoeur
text: You pay your bill and the lady (using that term loosely) calls and tells you that the unit is about to be foreclosed on. Bill is paid on time every month. The lady is very rude and cannot do the job. I get it's a family owned units but omg this is ridiculous. The lady always has some family issue and that is why she makes the errors, so she says. Been there 10 years and never had any issues until this lady took over. Leaving these storage units will be the best thing ever.

name: Leonard McCoy
text: I recently moved to the area, and I needed a storage unit. I contacted this storage facility and spoke with the manager, he was extremely helpful and had exactly what I needed at a great price. I was treated like an important customer and time was taken to answer all my questions. If you need the best in storage, this is the place to go!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Leonard! We pride ourselves on our customer service and you ARE an important customer!!

name: kumar Patel
text: This facility handled all my needs with ease, I was moving from another state and also needed storage. The manager took excellent care of me and my wife with UHaul services and a storage unit. I highly recommend park and store to anyone.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review Kumar! We are thrilled that you've had a positive experience with us! Thank you for your recommendation.

name: Patricia Whitaker
text: My parents have been using this storage unit since December of 2018. They recently changed the policy and decided to charge about $10 more a month. They sent the heads up of the policy change through email. My mother left a review letting everyone know to read the policy and check their email regularly. She said nothing rude or out of the way. About 5 minutes ago she got a call from the manager, Phillip, and she put it on speaker. He asked about her review on here. Telling her that he’s never been rude and that the review looks bad on him. She never said anything about him personally in her review. Just about the policy change. But he continued to try to argue about how her review made him look bad. He wouldn’t let her get a word in edgewise. She didn’t want to argue and got tired of being cut off mid-sentence, so she just hung up. He called back immediately. Well, my dad answered and told him that he didn’t need to call and harass my mom anymore. So the manager decided to tell my dad that he needed to come and get their stuff out of the storage unit. Even though they are paid up for the next 3 weeks. So even though my mom never  said anything about him personally, but the policy and email, that man is very UNPROFESSIONAL calling and harassing someone about their personal OPINION.

resp.text: Patricia, we are truly sorry for your negative experience with us. We absolutely support your right to free speech and encourage it. I understand your frustration. Our Operations Manager has reached out to your parents and will personally be able to handle any and all of your needs. Thank you for bringing this situation to our attention and leaving feedback! We will use this as a tool to learn from so that we can better serve you in the future!

name: Kyle Sutherland
text: I called about renting a Uhaul truck a few months ago, and the manager said he had what I needed on the lot. It was clean and ready to go as promised at the time I needed it. I also bought boxes and other supplies while I was there, had a great selection and good prices. I will definitely be using park and store again for excellent customer service and equipment.

resp.text: Thank you Kyle! It's always nice to hear when our customers have a good experience with us!

name: James Carney
text: A few weeks ago I moved to Alabama from Virginia to be closer to my grandchildren. I did a google search and found this facility, and gave them a call. Spoke with the manager Phil and asked about storage prices and availability. He had the unit I needed so I went down to check it out, and Phil was friendly and very knowledgeable plus took great care of me and my family, great place and staff!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to write this review James! We are thrilled that we could assist you and make your transition a little easier!

name: Laura Whitaker
text: Read your contract and check your email regularly. They change policy and you may not realize it. Before September,  I really liked that place.

resp.text: Thank you for your review Laura, we are very thankful to have you as a customer for more than 2 years now! We make every effort to communicate any changes in policy at a minimum of 30 days in advance before anything goes into effect. We are sorry that you had a negative experience and will try our best to better serve you in the future. Thank you for your feedback!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Garvie! We're happy to have you and will continue to serve you as best we can!

text: Amazing Customer Service. I have used this place numerous times and will continue to use this U-haul location !! Facility is nice and clean . Customer service is beyond excellent , thank you!!!

name: Becky Steadman
text: Excellent service and a very sweet lady named Kelley that works there.

name: Jon Gurley
text: We reserved our truck on Tuesday and received an email stating that it would be available at 10am. When we arrived at 10am we were informed that though the truck had arrived we must wait until a storage auction completed before we could complete the transaction and that it would be about 15 minutes. After waiting the 15 minutes we were then informed that there was another auction at a different facility and that they would return in 15 minutes to rent our truck. After 35 minutes of waiting we have given up. We received no apology, no indication of remorse for failing to uphold their end of the transaction, and worst we were dismissed as though our business meant nothing. How much time does it take to finish a transaction with a reserved truck? We tried to plan our moving day to be efficient with our and our friends time and this disrespect for our time has left us far less than pleased with our service. If there were an option for no stars it would have been selected.

name: Corey Flanigan
text: Great customer service and storage well kept environment!!!

resp.text: Thank you Corey! Customer Service is our #1 goal and maintain our facility on a daily basis to satisfy you and all of our valued customers. We're happy that you had a positive experience with us!

name: David Thornton
text: Good place

name: Alicia Roberts
text: I was considering storing some of my stuff here so my friend brought me over to see it. My friends just paid their bill and their door is still locked to their unit. I don’t think I would want to store anything here if I can’t get to it and cant get ahold of anyone to help me. It’s stupid and bad for business.you guys need to fix this if you want futur buyers

resp.text: Alicia, we are disappointed to hear that you did not have a more positive experience with us at Park & Store Self Storage but thank you for your feedback so that we can make Park & Store better for everyone. Thank you for leaving feedback.

name: Liz Curry
text: Love Gardendale Self Storage, everyone is so professional and nice. I had 2 climate-controlled units, stored there for a few years. name: Roger Paul
text: This is one absolutely great, fantastic and clean facility.  What a location. The owners are so friendly and helpful. I totally appreciate the brief opportunity i had to use the storage facility and will definitely have them as my first choice should i need a storage unit at anytime in the future. Thank you very much for making my use of your storage unit a pleasant one.

name: Mike Adams
text: I have nothing but great things to say about the facility or the people!  I rented a climate controlled room, and the entire place was always very clean and comfortable.  I never had a single problem with my room, my belongings, or the staff.  In fact, they even went out of their way to help me when I had a short notice/short duration need for additional storage space.  I absolutely recommend them to everyone needing storage space!

name: Deborah Dickinson
text: This is an absolutely great favility. It is clean and secure. If you are ever in need of a storage facility, please consider entrusting your belongings to Gardendale Self Storage.

name: Christy Hodge
text: Can't say enough about the owners! I've known them for 50 years and grew up with their daughters! When my husband's mother passed away a year ago, we needed storage for some furniture and we were living 1000 miles away in New York! Sharon helped us secure a unit and coordinated with our movers to move the items safely. She is incredibly responsive, professional and friendly! Justin was also a huge help! The facility is well-kept and clean. You won't be disappointed!

name: Clark Raymond
text: Excellent facility.  Buildings are nice and clean. We stored our possessions for over a year while building a home and when we returned to retrieve them, all of our belongings were just like we left them.  Will definitely use again.

name: Jennifer Jacobs
text: Great place! Very clean! Units are made so that no water can get in. Easy to access and wide aisles to allow easy unloading and loading.

name: Leslie Borden
text: Gardendale Self Storage is the best storage unit around. Very clean & they have all sizes that you need. They have inside climate control & outside units also. Sharon was so helpful & very friendly. Great people to deal with.Highly Recommend!

text: Very clean, well maintained climate controlled storage!

name: 1911iaaron
text: I used their facility for almost 2 years. Moving from another state I reserved the space over the phone and Sharon was super helpful and made the process really easy.  The facility is very clean! The grounds are well kept and the storage space itself was like new. I highly recommend this facility if you're looking for a clean well kept and friendly staff place for your storage needs.

text: I needed a unit for a short period of time before we moved into our house. The owners and the young lady in the office were so helpful, helping in every way possible.  The entire facility is spotless clean and they took excellent customer service to a new level. I know that this will be the only storage business that I will use. Thank you for helping me and giving great customer service.

name: Stacy Allen
text: Professional, great customer service, very clean facility in a great location. We stored for over a year without any problems. The owners were always there when came by to pay our rent planting flowers, cutting grass, changing lights or filling up the complimentary ice cold water they keep in the office for their customers. You can tell they take pride in their business. Sharon that works in the office goes above and beyond to make sure everything goes smoothly for your move in or move out. Her dedication to details shows. She is a great asset to Gardendale Self Storage, never met a nicer person. Will definitely store with them again!!

name: Ashley Glass
text: We used Gardendale Self Storage while building our house. The temperature in all of our climate control units was perfect year-round. I sold multiple pieces of furniture, that I wouldn't need in the new house, to people from all over who always commented that it was the nicest storage facility they had been in. Amazing customer service, easy access, and safety all make Gardendale Self Storage the business to choose.

name: Tina Madaris
text:
I've had a storage building here for 23 months at $85.00 monthly and have been late twice and paid late fees which is understandable,but, account was opened by relative in his name and I paid all payments with cards either my name or MAMA'S name on card because we have lived together for 15 years. Trying to get my name on the document instead of relative and nothing but a hassle!!!! Got in financial mess for around 3 months and lady who runs place, Sharon is rude, crude, always with a bad attitude, even before I got behind. I'd call to make a payment and being sarcastic and smart a_ _,
She'd say what card are you going to use today? REALLY SHOULDN'T MATTER WHAT CARD I PAY WITH AS LONG AS $85.00 clears!!!!!!! KNOWS I HAVE SEIZURES AND VERY HARD TO FIND RIDE. WALK ALOT. RECEIVED HATEFUL LETTER OTHER DAY SO I CALLED HER AND TOLD HER I WAS WALKING DOWN THERE AND WOULD GET THERE ASAP.  90 DEGREES OUT W/ HEAT INDEX ALMOST 100!!!!! Got there almost passing out stage. Signed paper work and walking again. Had a heat stroke on my way home. Sat down under the GARDENDALE FUNERAL HOME sign, almost couldn't see, very strange feeling, stood up and fell backwards twice. I still feel bad. She also knows I have sist in both knees. Miserable walk!!!!! Threatening to auction off our precious belongings/ MAMA'S GRAND MOTHER'S furniture and all kinds of things. Even put it in the paper to have auction and I stressed and stressed and had seizures galore and finally a friend paid her to keep unit and I paid friend back on my next payday but really didn't have it to give so done more juggling and next month, COME HELL OR HIGH WATER, I'M DONE WITH THAT UNGRATEFUL THING THAT RUNS
GARDENDALE SELF STORAGE/ Sharon Kimbrell
Was being nice giving 1* Deserves minus 10 stars.
